text: n March 2 , a disturbing report hit the desks of U.S. counterintelligence officials in NNP . For months , JJ spy hunters had scrambled to uncover details of NNP ’s influence operation against the CD presidential NN . In offices in both D.C. and suburban Virginia , they had created massive wall charts to track the JJ players in NNP ’s multipronged scheme . But the report in early March was something JJ . It described how NNP had already moved on from the rudimentary email hacks against politicians it had VBN in CD . Now the Russians were running a more sophisticated hack on NNP . The report VBD the Russians had sent expertly tailored messages carrying malware to more than 10,000 NNP NNS in the Defense Department . Depending on the interests of the targets , the messages offered links to stories on recent sporting events or the Oscars , which had taken place the previous weekend . When clicked , the links took NNS to a Russian - controlled server that downloaded a program allowing Moscow ’s hackers to take NN of the victim ’s phone or computer–and NNP account . As they scrambled to contain the damage from the hack and regain NN of any compromised devices , the spy hunters realized they faced a JJ kind of threat . In CD , NNP had VBN thousands of covert JJ agents and robot computer programs to spread disinformation referencing the stolen campaign emails of Hillary NNP , amplifying their effect . Now counterintelligence officials wondered : What chaos MD Moscow unleash with thousands of NNP handles that spoke in real NN with the authority of the armed forces of the NNP NNPS ? At any given moment , perhaps during a natural disaster or a terrorist attack , Pentagon NNP accounts might send out JJ NN . As each tweet corroborated another , and covert Russian agents amplified the messages RB further afield , the result MD be panic and confusion . For JJ Americans , Russian hacking remains a story about the CD NN . But there is another story taking shape . Marrying a hundred NNS of expertise in influence operations to the JJ NN of JJ NN , NNP MD finally have gained the ability it RB sought but never fully achieved in the Cold NNP : to alter the course of events in the U.S. by manipulating JJ opinion . The vast openness and anonymity of JJ NN has cleared a dangerous JJ route for antidemocratic forces . “ VBG these technologies , it is possible to undermine democratic NN , and it ’s becoming easier every day , ” VBZ Rand Waltzman of the Rand Corp. , who ran a major Pentagon research program to understand the propaganda threats posed by JJ NN technology . Current and JJ officials at the FBI , at the NNP and in Congress now VBP the CD Russian operation was just the most visible battle in an ongoing NN NN against JJ democracy . And they ’ve become more vocal about their concern . “ If there has ever been a clarion call for vigilance and NN against a threat to the very foundation of our democratic JJ NN , this episode is it , ” JJ Director of National Intelligence James Clapper testified before Congress on NNP 8 . If that sounds alarming , it helps to understand the battlescape of this JJ NN NN . As they tweet and VBP and upvote their NN through JJ NN , Americans generate a vast trove of NNS on what they VBP and how they respond to ideas and arguments –literally thousands of expressions of belief every second on NNP , NNP , Reddit and Google . All of those digitized convictions are collected and stored , and much of that NNS is available commercially to anyone with sufficient computing NN to take advantage of it . That ’s where the algorithms come in . JJ researchers have VBN they can use mathematical formulas to segment huge populations into thousands of subgroups according to defining characteristics IN religion and JJ beliefs or taste in TV shows and music . Other algorithms can determine those groups ’ hot - button issues and identify “ followers ” among them , pinpointing those most susceptible to suggestion . Propagandists can then manually craft messages to influence them , deploying covert provocateurs , either NNS or automated computer programs VBN as bots , in hopes of altering their behavior . That is what Moscow is doing , more than a dozen senior intelligence officials and others investigating NNP ’s influence operations tell NNP . The Russians “ target you and VBP what you VBP , what you click on , and VBP if you ’re sympathetic or not sympathetic , ” VBZ a senior intelligence official . Whether and how much they have actually been able to VB Americans ’ behavior is hard to VB . But as they have investigated the Russian CD operation , intelligence and other officials have VBN that Moscow has developed sophisticated tactics . In CD NN last NN , senior intelligence officials tell NNP , a Russian soldier VBN in Ukraine successfully infiltrated a U.S. JJ NN group by pretending to be a 42 - NN - old JJ housewife and weighing in on JJ debates with specially tailored messages . In another NN , officials VBP , NNP created a JJ NNP account to spread stories on JJ issues IN refugee resettlement to targeted reporters they believed were susceptible to influence . As NNP expands its cyberpropaganda efforts , the U.S. and its allies are only just beginning to figure out how to fight back . CD problem : the fear of Russian influence operations can be more damaging than the operations themselves . Eager to appear more powerful than they are , the Russians MD consider it a success if you questioned the truth of your NN sources , knowing that Moscow might be lurking in your NNP or NNP feed . But figuring out if they are is hard . Uncovering “ signals that indicate a particular handle is a NN - sponsored account is RB , RB difficult , ” VBZ Jared Cohen , CEO of Jigsaw , a subsidiary of Google ’s parent NN , Alphabet , which tackles JJ security challenges . IN JJ a good spy tale , the story of how the U.S. learned its democracy MD be hacked started with loose lips . In NNP CD , a Russian JJ intelligence officer bragged to a colleague that his organization , VBN as the GRU , was getting ready to pay NNP back for what NNP Vladimir Putin believed was an influence operation she had run against him five NNS earlier as Secretary of NNP . The GRU , he VBD , was VBG to VB chaos in the upcoming U.S. NN . What the officer did n’t VB , senior intelligence officials tell NN , was that U.S. spies were listening . They wrote up the conversation and sent it back to analysts at headquarters , who turned it from raw intelligence into an official report and circulated it . But if the officer ’s boast seems IN a red flag now , at the NN U.S. officials did n’t VB what to make of it . “ We did n’t RB understand the context of it until much later , ” VBZ the senior intelligence official . Investigators now realize that the officer ’s boast was the JJ indication U.S. spies had from their sources that NNP was n’t just hacking email accounts to collect intelligence but was RB considering interfering in the vote . IN much of NNP , JJ in the U.S. NN had n’t imagined the kind of influence operation that NNP was preparing to unleash on the CD NN . Fewer still realized it had been five NNS in the making . In 2011 , protests in more than 70 cities across NNP had threatened Putin ’s NN of the Kremlin . The uprising was organized on JJ NN by a popular blogger named Alexei Navalny , who VBD his blog as well as NNP and NNP to VB crowds in the streets . Putin ’s forces broke out their own JJ NN technique to strike back . When bloggers tried to organize nationwide protests on NNP VBG # Triumfalnaya , pro-Kremlin botnets bombarded the hashtag with anti-protester messages and nonsense tweets , making it impossible for Putin ’s opponents to coalesce . Putin publicly accused then Secretary of NNP NNP of running a massive influence operation against his country , saying she had sent “ a signal ” to protesters and that the NNP Department had actively worked to fuel the protests . The NNP Department VBD it had just funded pro-democracy organizations . JJ officials VBP any such operations –in NNP or elsewhere –would require a special intelligence finding by the NNP and that Barack Obama was not likely to have issued CD . After his re-election the following NN , Putin dispatched his newly installed head of JJ intelligence , Igor Sergun , to begin repurposing cyberweapons previously VBN for psychological operations in NN zones for use in electioneering . Russian intelligence agencies funded “ troll farms , ” botnet spamming operations and JJ NN outlets as part of an expanding focus on psychological operations in cyberspace . It turns out Putin had outside NN . CD particularly talented Russian programmer who had worked with JJ NN researchers in the U.S. for CD NNS had returned to Moscow and brought with him a trove of algorithms that MD be VBN in influence operations . He was promptly hired by those working for Russian intelligence services , senior intelligence officials tell NNP . “ The engineer who built them the algorithms is U.S. - trained , ” VBZ the senior intelligence official . Soon , Putin was aiming his JJ weapons at the U.S. Following Moscow ’s April 2014 invasion of Ukraine , the U.S. considered sanctions that MD block the export of drilling and fracking technologies to NNP , putting out of reach some $ 8.2 trillion in oil reserves that MD not be tapped without U.S. technology . As they watched Moscow ’s intelligence operations in the U.S. , JJ spy hunters saw Russian agents applying their JJ JJ NN tactics on key aides to members of Congress . Moscow ’s agents broadcast material on JJ NN and watched how targets responded in an attempt to find those who might support their NN , the senior intelligence official tells NNP . “ The Russians started VBG it on the Hill with staffers , ” the official VBZ , “ to VB who is more susceptible to continue this program [ and ] to VB who MD be more favorable to what they VBP to do . ” On Aug. 7 , CD , the infamous pharmaceutical executive Martin Shkreli declared that Hillary NNP had Parkinson’s . That story went viral in late August , then took on a NN of its own after NNP fainted from pneumonia and dehydration at a Sept. 11 event in NNP NNP City . Elsewhere NNS invented stories saying Pope Francis had endorsed NNP and NNP had murdered a DNC staffer . Just before NN Day , a story took off alleging that NNP and her aides ran a pedophile ring in the basement of a D.C. NN parlor . Congressional investigators are looking at how NNP helped stories IN these spread to specific audiences . Counterintelligence officials , meanwhile , have picked up NN that NNP tried to target particular influencers during the NN season who they reasoned MD VB spread the damaging stories . These officials have seen NN of NNP VBG its algorithmic techniques to target the JJ NN accounts of particular reporters , senior intelligence officials tell NNP . “ It ’s not necessarily the journal or the newspaper or the TV show , ” VBZ the senior intelligence official . “ It ’s the specific reporter that they find who might be a little bit slanted toward believing things , and they ’ll hit him ” with a flood of JJ NN stories . NNP plays in every JJ NN NN . The intelligence officials have VBN that Moscow ’s agents bought ads on NNP to target specific populations with propaganda . “ They buy the ads , where it VBZ sponsored by –they do that just as much as anybody else does , ” VBZ the senior intelligence official . ( A NNP official VBZ the NN has no NN of that occurring . ) The ranking Democrat on the Senate Intelligence Committee , Mark Warner of Virginia , has VBN he is looking into why , for example , four of the top five Google search results the day the U.S. released a report on the CD operation were links to NNP ’s TV propaganda arm , RT . ( Google VBZ it saw no meddling in this NN . ) Researchers at the NNP of Southern California , meanwhile , VBD that nearly 20 % of JJ tweets in CD between Sept. 16 and Oct. 21 were generated by bots of unknown origin ; investigators are trying to figure out how JJ were Russian . As they dig into the viralizing of such stories , congressional investigations are probing not just NNP ’s role but whether Moscow had NN from the NNP campaign . Sources familiar with the investigations VBP they are probing CD NNP - linked organizations : Cambridge Analytica , a NN - analytics NN hired by the campaign that is partly owned by deep - pocketed NNP backer Robert Mercer ; and Breitbart NNP , the JJ - wing website formerly run by NNP ’s top JJ adviser Stephen Bannon . The congressional investigators are looking at ties between those NNS and JJ - wing web personalities VBN in Eastern Europe who the U.S. believes are Russian fronts , a source familiar with the investigations tells NN . “ Nobody can prove it yet , ” the source VBZ . In March , McClatchy newspapers reported that FBI counterintelligence investigators were probing whether far - JJ sites IN Breitbart NNP and Infowars had coordinated with Russian botnets to blitz JJ NN with anti-Clinton stories , mixing fact and fiction when NNP was doing poorly in the campaign . There are plenty of NNS who are skeptical of such a NN , if CD existed . Cambridge Analytica touts its ability to use algorithms to microtarget voters , but veteran JJ operatives have VBN them ineffective JJ influencers . Ted Cruz RB VBD their methods during the primary , and his staff ended up concluding they had wasted their NN . Mercer , Bannon , Breitbart NNP and the White NNP did not answer questions about the congressional probes . A spokesperson for Cambridge Analytica VBZ the NN has no ties to NNP or individuals acting as fronts for Moscow and that it is unaware of the probe . Democratic operatives searching for explanations for NNP ’s loss after the NN investigated JJ NN trends in the three NNS that tipped the vote for NNP : Michigan , Wisconsin and Pennsylvania . In each they VBD what they VBP is NN that key swing voters were being drawn to JJ NN stories and anti-Clinton stories RB . Google searches for the JJ pedophilia story circulating under the hashtag #pizzagate , for example , were disproportionately higher in swing districts and not in districts likely to vote for NNP . The Democratic operatives created a package of background materials on what they had VBN , suggesting the search behavior might indicate that someone had successfully altered the behavior in key voting districts in key NNS . They circulated it to fellow party members who are up for a vote in 2018 . RB as investigators try to piece together what happened in CD , they are worrying about what comes next . NNP claims to be able to alter events VBG cyberpropaganda and is doing what it can to tout its NN . In February CD , a Putin adviser named Andrey Krutskikh compared NNP ’s NN - warfare strategies to the Soviet Union ’s obtaining a nuclear weapon in the 1940s , David Ignatius of the NNP Post reported . “ We are at the verge of having something in the NN arena which will allow us to talk to the Americans as equals , ” Krutskikh VBD . But if NNP is clearly moving forward , it ’s less clear how active the U.S. has been . Documents released by JJ National Security Agency contractor Edward Snowden and published by the Intercept suggested that the British were pursuing JJ NN propaganda and had shared their tactics with the U.S. Chris Inglis , the JJ No. 2 at the National Security Agency , VBZ the U.S. has not pursued this capability . “ The Russians are CD NNS ahead of us in being willing to make use of ” JJ NN to influence JJ opinion , he VBZ . There are signs that the U.S. MD be playing in this field , however . From 2010 to 2012 , the U.S. Agency for International Development established and ran a “ Cuban NNP ” network designed to undermine communist NN on the island . At the same NN , according to the Associated Press , which discovered the program , the U.S. NN hired a contractor to profile Cuban cell phone NNS , categorizing them as “ pro-revolution , ” “ apolitical ” or “ antirevolutionary . ” Much of what is publicly VBN about the mechanics and techniques of JJ NN propaganda comes from a program at the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ) that the Rand researcher , Waltzman , ran to VB how propagandists might manipulate JJ NN in the future . In the Cold NNP , operatives might distribute disinformation - laden newspapers to targeted JJ groups or insinuate an agent provocateur into a group of influential intellectuals . By harnessing computing NN to segment and target literally millions of NNS in real NN RB , Waltzman concluded , you MD potentially VB behavior “ on the scale of democratic governments . ” In the U.S. , JJ scrutiny of such programs is usually enough to shut them down . In 2014 , NN articles appeared about the DARPA program and the “ Cuban NNP ” project . It was only a NN after Snowden had revealed widespread monitoring programs by the NN . The DARPA program , already under a cloud , was allowed to expire quietly when its funding ran out in 2015 . In the wake of NNP ’s CD NN hack , the question is how to research JJ NN propaganda without violating civil liberties . The NN is all the more urgent because the technology continues to advance . While today NNS are still required to tailor and distribute messages to specially targeted “ susceptibles , ” in the future crafting and transmitting emotionally powerful messages will be automated . The U.S. NN is constrained in what kind of research it can fund by various laws protecting citizens from domestic propaganda , NN electioneering and intrusions on their privacy . Waltzman has started a group called NNP Professionals Association with several JJ NN operations officers from the U.S. NN to develop defenses against JJ NN influence operations . JJ NN NNS are beginning to realize that they VBP to take NN . NNP issued a report in April 2017 acknowledging that much disinformation had been spread on its pages and saying it had expanded its security . Google VBZ it has seen no NN of Russian manipulation of its search results but has updated its algorithms just in NN . NNP claims it has diminished cyberpropaganda by tweaking its algorithms to block cleverly designed bots . “ Our algorithms currently work to detect when NNP accounts are attempting to manipulate NNP ’s Trends through inorganic activity , and then automatically adjust , ” the NN VBD in a statement . In the meantime , NNP ’s best option to protect upcoming votes MD be to make it harder for NNP and other bad actors to hide their NN - related NN operations . When it comes to defeating Russian influence operations , the answer is “ transparency , transparency , transparency , ” VBZ Rhode Island Democratic Senator Sheldon Whitehouse . He has written legislation that MD curb the massive , anonymous campaign contributions VBN as dark NN and the widespread use of shell corporations that he VBZ make Russian cyberpropaganda harder to trace and expose . But much damage has already been done . “ The ultimate impact of [ the CD Russian operation ] is we ’re never VBG to look at another NN without wondering , you VBP , Is this happening , can we VB it happening ? ” VBZ Jigsaw ’s Jared Cohen . By raising doubts about the validity of the CD vote and the vulnerability of future elections , NNP has achieved its most important objective : undermining the credibility of JJ democracy . For now , investigators have added the names of specific trolls and botnets to their wall charts in the offices of intelligence and law - enforcement agencies . They VBP the best NN to compete with the Russian model is by having a better message . “ It requires critical thinkers and NNS who have a more powerful vision ” than the cynical Russian view , VBZ JJ NSA deputy Inglis . And what message is powerful enough to take on the firehose of falsehoods that NNP is deploying in targeted , effective ways across a range of JJ NN ? CD good place to start : telling the truth . text: Donald NNP has shared a tweet by a notorious far JJ NN theorist who gained headlines for taking a “ rape Melania ” sign to a rally . The US NN retweeted a post by Jack Posobiec - a figure linked to the so - called “ alt JJ ” movement who is famed for promoting wholly erroneous and debunked NN NNS . Mr Posobiec is best VBN for the Pizzagate NN NN which falsely alleged a NNP pizzeria was the home of a NN sex abuse ring that included NNS such as Hilary NNP and her then campaign chief John Podesta . The baseless and spurious NN led to a NN firing a gun at the NN joint in CD . Mr Posobiec took a “ rape Melania ” sign to anti-Trump protest just after the CD presidential NN in the attempt to paint such rallies as aggressive and belligerent , according to Buzzfeed NNP . But this did not stop Mr NNP from sharing a tweet posted by Mr Posobiec , who has denied the charge he took such a sign to the rally , over the weekend . “ Dick Durbin called NNP racist for wanting to end chain migration . Here 's a NN of Dick Durbin calling for an end to chain migration , ” Mr Posobiec VBD in the tweet that Mr NNP then chose to share . The tweet claimed it linked to a NN of Mr Durbin calling for an end to chain migration but the NN actually showed the Democrat commenting that the DREAM act being extended MD not result in “ chain migration ” - a term that refers to family immigration . The section of the clip cut by Mr Posobiec shows Mr Durbin reading a description of the DREAM Act and its affect on family migration . Mr Durbin , a senior Democrat senator from Illinois , was among the senators who attended a meeting with Mr NNP in which the NN is VBN to have referred to Haiti , El Salvador and African nations as “ shithole NNS . ” Mr Durbin VBD reporters Mr NNP had made the remarks , saying : “ I cannot VB that in the history of the White NNP , in that Oval Office , any NN has ever spoken the words that I personally heard our NN speak yesterday ” . He added : “ The NNP started tweeting this morning , denying that he VBD those words . It is not JJ . He VBD these hate - filled things , and he VBD them repeatedly . ” Mr NNP eventually issued a denial on NNP , insisting the language he VBD was " tough " but JJ to what was claimed . Mr Posobiec , who started the viral # DumpStarWars hashtag in December CD after claiming Rogue CD contained anti-Trump scenes , has RB pushed a NN NN that the Democratic National Committee was behind the murder of staffer Seth Rich . It has been proven to be completely JJ . Mr Posobiec , who worked for far JJ Canada VBN site The Rebel NNP for CD months in 2017 , has sparked criticism for his NNS . Will Sommer , an editor at US JJ publication The Hill VBD Posobiec " make[s ] stuff up , relentlessly " and claimed " there 's no NN at that level . " This is by no means the JJ NN Mr NNP has stoked controversy for retweeting someone on the far NN . Last November , the billionaire shared a series of islamophobic tweets from far - JJ extremist group Britain RB , prompting outrage for disseminating its " deplorable " ideology to a JJ audience . The NN - which is JJ - purported to show a Muslim NN attacking a boy on crutches . The White NNP sought to defend Mr NNP at the NN and press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders insisted that regardless of whether the videos were real “ the threats are real – no matter how you look at it ” . Mr NNP RB shared a tweet by Mr Posobiec in the wake of a white supremacist rally in Charlottesville over the summer which saw anti-fascist activists clash with neo -Nazis , Ku Klux Klan members and farright supporters . Clashes turned deadly after a 20 - NN - old NN , who officials VBP had Nazi sympathies , mowed his car into the crowd of peaceful anti-fascist demonstrators and killed a female civil rights activist . Mr Posobiec had posted a link to a NN story tallying those killed and injured in shootings in Chicago , adding : " Meanwhile : 39 shootings in Chicago this weekend , 9 deaths . No national NN outrage . Why is that ? " Mr NNP , who has frequently drawn attention to the issue of gun violence in Chicago in his NNP tirades and speeches , shared the tweet penned by him .

text: MSNBC Analyst Claims ‘ Conspiracies ’ About FBI Text Messages MD Lead to Violence “ There are VBG to be consequences ” MSNBC JJ analyst Elise Jordan suggested that NN NNS about missing FBI text messages MD lead to a violent massacre . Remarking that NNP supporters pushing for the release of the missing text messages ( which have since been VBN ) “ do n’t realize the consequences … where this MD end , ” Jordan compared the issue to the CD PizzaGate controversy , which ended in a 28 - NN - old NN walking into the NNP Ping Pong NN in NNP DC and firing three shots from an AR - 15 rifle . “ You VBP , it seemed IN fun and games for plenty of the NN theorists who were saying that Hillary NNP had a pedophilia ring in a D.C. NN parlor until a guy showed up there with a machine gun , ” Jordan VBD . “ And , the NNP ’s rhetoric , the rhetoric that is endorsed by his followers — by his prominent followers on television — there are VBG to be consequences . And I VBP that it ’s something that they should VB about as they actively endorse it , ” she added . However , unlike PizzaGate , the FBI text messages are part of a national NN story and a national debate , they are evidently not a NN NN . Jordan ’s rhetoric is similar to her MSNBC colleague Joe Scarborough ’s insistence that the text messages and discussion of a “ secret society ” within the FBI are “ NN NNS ” being “ spread for JJ reasons , ” despite the fact that FBI Agent Peter Strzok and FBI Attorney Lisa Page ’s text messages directly mention a “ secret society ” within the FBI . In addition , a separate whistleblower VBD Senator Ron Johnson ( R - Wisc. ) that this same “ secret society ” was holding meetings “ off - site ” . Jordan ’s absurd and hyperbolic suggestion that asking questions about corruption within the FBI and the Justice Department MD lead to some kind of violent mass murder is obviously designed to shut down debate about the issue by declaring it to be a dangerous NN NN when it clearly is n’t . The irony is that while fearmongering about NN NNS , Jordan herself is spouting a ludicrous NN NN . Paul Joseph Watson is the editor at JJ of Infowars.com and Prison Planet.com . text: VB to VB what the dark web looks IN without RB having to VB there ? A map released Tuesday by research and development outfit Hyperion Gray is bringing to NN the often misunderstood and decried corner of the internet . In what the NN believes is an unprecedented effort to illuminate hidden services on the dark web , it allows anyone to zoom in and out of images containing the homepage of each website VBN on the Tor network . ( Tor , run by the Tor Project , is designed to provide anonymity for its NNS and the hidden services within are considered to make up the largest section of the dark web . ) Be warned , though . The NN within the Dark Web Map can be graphic . As Hyperion Gray 's disclaimer notes : " These sites include mature and / or offensive NN , including pornography , violence and racism . " The map shows 6,608 dark web sites crawled during January 2018 . That includes all manner of webpages , from the amusing to the horrific . Amongst the myriad pages on the map , Forbes has already seen NN of extreme sexual NN , credit card cloning NNS , pictures of poop and penises , a JJ number of Bitcoin scams , Propublica 's Tor website and a range of whistleblower pages VBN on the SecureDrop service . That includes Forbes ' own SecureDrop service ( feel free to drop us a tip securely anytime ) . What 's apparent from a cursory view of the map , zooming in and out of JJ areas , is that a significant proportion of mapped sites have been set up for illegal means , but there are RB plenty of legal services such as whistleblower and personal pages . That 's something Hyperion Gray CTO Alejandro Caceres ( and co-founder with Amanda Towler ) discovered too . " I VBP Tor 's narrative that the technology preserves JJ freedom , privacy , freedom of speech , " he VBD . " But the NNS clearly indicates that this is at the very least a double - edged sword . While we did n't put out this research to take a side on the debate about hidden services , it 's not something that can be ignored either - there 's a lot of shitty stuff out there . " I should add that I use Tor daily for JJ reasons , and hidden services should n't be taken as the core of what the Tor project is and does . " Caceres RB donates to the Tor Project . The map was partly VBN on an experiment carried out with the MEMEX project at Darpa , the research arm of the Pentagon . As Forbes has previously reported , the aim of MEMEX was to create simple search engines for the dark web and had proven useful for cops investigating JJ trafficking . But the digital cartography was entirely self - funded , explained Mark Haase , computer scientist at Hyperion Gray and the NN behind the map . Haas started with a list of 60,000 Tor addresses , RB VBN as onions because of their .onion extensions . He wrote a script that downloaded the home page for each and took a screenshot . About 6,600 sites responded , whilst the other 53,000 either timed out or returned errors . Haase then manually redacted any screenshots that appeared to contain illegal NN , VBG by U.S. laws . NNS will note the clusters of JJ sites . They 're bunched together thanks to a " similarity algorithm " that assigns each page a score between 0.0 and 1.0 . That similarity is VBN on the structure of the website 's code . " The layout algorithm tries to put sites that are similar to each other close together on the map and tries to move dissimilar sites out of the NN , which causes groups of similar pages to move towards each other and form into clusters , " Haase explained to Forbes over encrypted chat . " CD sites can be ' similar ' in terms of HTML structure but contain totally JJ NN . " The map should provide a comprehensive view of the dark web , RB if it does n't give the entire picture . For instance , JJ .onion domains do n't VB to a webpage , but to file or chat servers . And some can be hidden , RB from computer NNS who've contracted with the U.S. NN . " It 's representative , but definitely not exhaustive , " added Haase . " If somebody RB wants to hide an onion , it 's very difficult for an outsider to find it . " Haase hopes that there are CD audiences for the Dark Web Map . " RB , novice NNS who only have a hazy idea of what ' dark web ' means , maybe they can VB a better sense for what it is - maybe not radically JJ from the open web that they already VBP - and a sense of what NN is on it . Second , for expert NNS , we are planning a series of articles doing a deeper technical analysis and hopefully coming out with some novel observations about the structure of the dark web . " " CD thing i VBP that 's interesting about this visualization is that it likely either confirms or challenges NNS 's existing perceptions , " Towler added . " But the NNS itself does n't have a motive . It just is what it is . " Anyone who believes they ’ve seen illegal NN on the map , such as NN exploitation material , should send an email to contact@hyperiongray.com with the details . This is n't the JJ NN Hyperion Gray has gone out looking for nasty things on the web . It previously created a search engine for sites with common vulnerabilities , dubbed PunkSpider , hoping to expose poor security across the internet .

text: In his T - shirt , skinny jeans and sharply styled haircut , Martin Sellner is the European far NN 's newest poster boy . The group he leads in Austria has attracted huge publicity . However , Sellner 's insistence that his movement is non-racist and non-violent does n't have everyone convinced . In April CD , hundreds of NNS sat inside the NNP of Vienna 's theatre watching The Suppliants , a play performed by asylum - seekers from Syria , Iraq and Afghanistan . And then the stage invasion began . Members of a far - JJ group called Generation Identity ( GI ) rushed in , unfurling a banner calling the audience hypocrites and throwing JJ NN over some of them . The performers screamed , fearing they were under attack . There were scuffles as some in the audience began shouting " Nazis raus " or " Nazis out " and tried to eject the protesters . Ima was CD of the performers . She had fled Mosul in Iraq when it was taken over by the so - called Islamic NNP group . " We came from the land of fear , " she VBZ . And now , in the darkness and confusion , she was scared again . " We thought they were VBG to kill us . In my homeland it 's just so much killing and dead NNS so that 's what we believed . " The young NN who leads GI in Austria plays down the incident . " I actually do n't VB NNS were RB traumatised , " he VBZ . " I do n't VB anybody who had a severe trauma or a JJ condition . " His name is Martin Sellner , and with his striking haircut , fashionable skinny jeans and thick - rimmed glasses , he looks IN a typical style - conscious 29 - NN - old . IN JJ others of his generation , he can normally be VBN staring into the lens of a mobile phone - but in Sellner 's NN , it 's typically to deliver a monologue about the evils of multiculturalism and how Muslims VBP to take over Europe . He is often joined in his videos on NNP by his fiancee , Brittany Pettibone , an alt - JJ vlogger and NN theorist . Her posts about a so - called " white genocide " and a paedophile ring connected to Hillary NNP led the Anti-Defamation NNP to place her on its list of hate groups . Earlier this NN Sellner and Pettibone were both banned from entering the UK . The Home Office VBD that when " the purpose of someone 's visit to this country is to spread hatred , the Home Office can and will stop them entering Britain " . Sellner is n't just GI 's leader in Austria . He 's RB a poster boy for the Europe - wide Identitarian movement , which is fiercely opposed to Muslim migrants - claiming that they threaten Europe 's identity and will eventually replace the indigenous populations . The movement began in France in 2012 and has expanded to nine NNS including Germany , Italy and recently the UK . It does n't have JJ members but gets publicity through confrontational and expensive stunts . In the summer of 2017 , GI raised over £ 150,000 through crowdfunding to charter a boat in the Mediterranean to target non-governmental organisations that patrol the NN to rescue migrants in peril . GI VBD it MD arrest illegal migrants and sink their boats - its campaign received the backing of a neo -Nazi website , JJ Ku Klux Klan leader David Duke and a leading JJ white supremacist . It did n't quite VB to plan , though . GI 's boat was detained and the captain was arrested , accused of having illegal Sri Lankan refugees on board and JJ documents . They were all later released . A few months later , GI paid for a red helicopter to land on the crisp white snow of the French Alps . Flanked by 100 activists from across Europe , a massive poster was laid out telling migrants to VB home . This stunt cost more than £ 50,000 . But the organisation 's actions in Austria have landed it in deep trouble . The Austrian authorities VBP that actions IN the protest at the NNP of Vienna theatre and Generation Identity 's accompanying rhetoric amount to incitement of hatred against Muslims , foreigners and refugees . It 's why they have taken the unprecedented step of charging GI with being a criminal group , rather than the non-governmental organisation it VBZ it is . The Austrian prosecutor compiled NN from stunts GI carried out in the past CD NNS . These included the targeting of a lecture at Klagenfurt NNP , a JJ campus set amidst the jagged mountains and cool lakes of Carinthia . Identitarians disrupted a talk on refugees and integration , unfurling a banner while a NN with a megaphone barked at a shocked audience . Enis Husic , a softly spoken student from Bosnia , challenged them that day . " It was very tense and aggressive . I MD RB sense that , " he VBZ . " At the NN I was n't scared but I was very scared afterwards once it was all over . " The fresh - faced rector , Prof Oliver Vitouch , was looking out of his office window when he saw protesters and rushed to confront them . He was hit by CD of them as they tried to escape . " Although they usually VBP they 're completely free of violence and completely peaceful , it 's pretty clear to me that the readiness to violence is obviously there , " he VBZ . For NNS , GI was dismissed by its critics as a bunch of wannabe hipster Nazis - but Natasha Strobl , an author and researcher , has RB thought their actions and rhetoric pose a threat to the country . " They paint refugees as invaders , as dangerous soldiers of Islam who come here to destroy Europe . It RB destroys society , " she VBZ . As a result of this rhetoric , she adds , " NNS VBP aggressive , NNS harass Muslim women on the streets " . She wrote a book about the Identitarian movement and then began receiving threats . " There are rape and murder threats when you open your email … I try not to VB the same ways in the city because I do n't VB to be followed . So you VBP how you live . " Generation Identity VBZ it 's not racist or violent but articulating the views of JJ Austrians . Martin Sellner grew up in an affluent suburb outside of Vienna . In his teenage NNS , Strobl VBZ , he was drawn to the nationalist fringe in Austria . " He was part of the neo - Nazi scene and the most well - VBN figure of the neo - Nazis , Gottfried Kussel , was his mentor , " she VBZ . At the NN Kussel had already been to prison for trying to revive Nazism . He was arrested again in 2011 and later jailed for nine NNS for continued far - JJ activity . It was after this , in 2012 , that Martin Sellner set up the Identitarians in Austria . We meet him inside their offices in a scrappy apartment in the centre of Vienna . It 's fairly basic apart from a room full of cameras , laptops and lights where they make and edit their videos . Sellner is relaxed and confident ; the day before he had been acquitted , along with 16 other GI members and supporters , of belonging to a criminal organisation . " I RB VBP we were vindicated and I hope that this verdict will RB have an effect beyond this NN and beyond Austria in the rehabilitation of GI , " he VBZ , sipping from a glass of sparkling NN . The prosecutor is appealing against the acquittal and is investigating GI 's finances . GI likes to stress it 's not violent or racist , but what of Martin Sellner 's past ? He admits he was involved with neo -Nazis when he was younger because , he VBZ , " there was no alternative . There was no JJ - wing patriotic movement " . When asked bluntly : " So you were n't a racist ? " his fluency falters . Simon Cox 's documentary Generation Identity , produced by Anna Meisel , is broadcast on BBC Radio 4's Crossing Continents at 11:00 on Thursday 20 September 2018 . Listen again on iPlayer For transmission times on the BBC NNP Service , click here When pressed further - " Surely you 'd VB if you were a racist ? " - he still sounds a little unsure . " I MD n't VB I was . It was a very ambiguous thing . I MD VB I was IN a conservative , patriot . " Earlier this NN , before he was banned from the UK , he was secretly filmed by undercover reporters during a trip to London . He was captured VBG a racist and offensive term . He VBZ it was a genuine mistake . " I RB thought that ' Paki ' was a completely normal term . If I MD have VBN it , that it was considered a racial slur , I MD have definitely not VBN it . " " Come off it , " we tell him . " You come to the UK a lot - the idea you MD n't VB it was offensive is n't believable . " He once again insists he did n't VB and apologises . " If I insulted anybody with this word , I absolutely VBP sorry and I will never use it again . " GI 's actions often target events which promote integration - because , he VBZ , he does n't VB in this . The Muslims who come to Europe must do more , he VBZ - they must assimilate . " Assimilation means that you completely identify with the country , the nation , its history , " he VBZ - otherwise , he warns , " it 's treason , because you 're betraying this community … because this community is giving you open hands , taking you in and then you have to put the interests of this community in front of your own . " Standing in his NN are anti-fascist campaigners IN Jerome Trebing . Publicly , Sellner 's group VBZ it is not violent or racist . But Trebing has worked with activists who have gone into meetings GI holds in isolated rural areas . As he sips sweet tea in a Turkish cafe in Vienna 's multicultural 10th district , a place that GI abhors , Trebing VBZ : " There is some RB hard stuff VBG on . There are NNS who are allowed to VB racist stuff , anti-Semitic stuff and there is no - CD who is saying there is no place for it here . " According to Trebing , in these meetings GI supporters VBD it was n't just Muslims who wanted to replace the local population , but Jews too . The saga of ' Pizzagate ' : The JJ story that shows how NN NNS spread Who 's behind the fighting at US universities ? GI 's leader denies it has any bias against the Jewish population . He wants to expand the Identitarian movement to other European nations . In Austria , he VBZ , " We have a JJ - wing NN . And we VBP to push for that everywhere in Europe , we RB VBP to VB JJ discourse . " Sellner 's ban on visiting the UK has made it harder for him to spread his message to potential supporters , but RB he is still very active - although he has been banned from NNP . In mainland Europe he is free to lead GI 's continued aggressive , provocative targeting of Muslims . Besima is CD of those who have been on the receiving end of GI activity . Sitting in her faded apartment drinking sweet tea with freshly made lamb koftas , she describes how she was performing with other asylum seekers at the NNP theatre in Vienna when GI stormed in . Her son Mohammed was on stage with her too and she VBD the experience had traumatised him . " He has refused to VB out , he is still at home , saying ' If I VBP out something bad will happen to me . ' " Mohammed had been kidnapped in Iraq , which is CD of the reasons she originally fled Basra with her three NNS . When she arrived CD NNS ago she felt welcomed and accepted but feels the atmosphere towards migrants is changing . " I thought I VBD happiness and peace here , " she VBZ , " but I feel it 's not safe any more . " Join the conversation - find us on NNP , Instagram , NNP and NNP .

text: The NN accused of setting the 18,000 - acre Holy fire in Orange County that prompted thousands of residents to evacuate their homes this week made his initial NN appearance Friday . Forrest Gordon Clark , 51 , made several outbursts during the hearing in Santa Ana , calling the charges against him a “ lie , ’ ” and insisting again that he was being threatened , according to City NNP Service . When a NN commissioner ordered his bail to remain at $ 1 CD , Clark VBD he MD easily afford it . His arraignment was postponed until Aug. 17 . Clark , who has been charged with multiple counts of arson in connection with the Holy fire , was originally scheduled to appear in NN Thursday but refused to leave his jail cell , according to Carrie Braun , JJ NN officer for the Orange County Sheriff ’s Department . Clark gave a rambling interview to a television reporter earlier this week , claiming to VB nothing about how the fire started . In postings published in mid-July , Clark RB complained about a neighbor in Trabuco Canyon who he accused of VBG drugs and inviting gang members into the neighborhood . Clark RB accused the NN of stealing something from his cabin , according to the post . After reviewing Clark ’s JJ NN posts , Brian Levin , director of the Cal NNP San Bernardino Center on Hate and Extremism , VBD Clark appeared to be an “ anti- NN , anti-establishment NN theorist . ” He expressed specific concerns about Clark ’s adherence to conspiracies involving land use . text: Her earliest encounter with the entertainment NN MD certainly raise concern by 2014 standards . Temple got her start at age three acting in “ Baby Burlesks , ” which today 's NNP NNP Times describes as " a series of sexually suggestive CD - reel shorts in which NNS played all the roles . " When kids on set misbehaved , they were sent to a black sound booth where they 'd sit on a block of NN . “ So far as I can tell , the black box did no lasting damage to my psyche , ” she MD later write . In the NNS after those shorts , she MD rise to international fame in films IN Little Miss Marker , Heidi , and The Little Princess . She was beloved , but not everyone felt comfortable with the NN Hollywood capitalized on her youth . Graham Greene MD flee the country after a libel suit followed his critical review of Wee Willie Winkie : The owners of a NN star are IN leaseholders -- their property diminishes in value every NN . NN 's chariot is at their back ; before them acres of anonymity . Miss Shirley Temple 's NN , though , has a peculiar interest : infancy is her disguise , her appeal is more secret and more adult . [...] Her admirers -- middle - aged men and clergymen - - respond to her dubious coquetry , to the sight of her well - shaped and desirable little body , packed with enormous vitality , only because the safety curtain of story and dialogue drops between their intelligence and their desire . Of course in the NNS since , similar complaints have arisen from pop culture 's treatment of NN stars , though that treatment these days comes in the more overtly provocative form of magazine photo shoots and racy film scenes . But stardom threatened Temple in other ways . In 1939 , a woman who thought Temple had stolen her daughter 's soul tried to assassinate her during a radio performance . " The tale seemed understandable to me , ” Temple wrote of the incident in NNP Star . text: Hillary NNP issued a call to NN against the “ epidemic ” of JJ NN in a rare JJ appearance since her unexpected loss to Donald NNP . The Democratic presidential nominee warned that the proliferation of JJ NN stories RB can have “ real NN consequences ” , alluding to an incident over the weekend in which a NN opened fire at NNP Ping Pong after reading a JJ NN story that purported the DC pizzeria was harboring NNS as part of a sex ring led by NNP . No NN was injured . “ This is not about politics or partisanship , ” NNP VBD , during a tribute to departing Senate minority leader Harry Reid . “ Lives are at NN . Lives of ordinary NNS just trying to VB about their days to do their jobs , contribute to their communities . ” “ It is a danger that must be addressed and addressed quickly . ” NNP was joined by Vice - NN Joe Biden and congressional leaders of both parties to bid farewell to Reid , who leaves the chamber after 30 NNS in the Senate . When NNP rose to speak , she received a standing ovation from the audience , which included lawmakers from both sides of the aisle . The JJ secretary of NN has maintained a low profile since the NN , enjoying hikes in the woods near her home in Chappaqua , NNP NNP . A number of locals have posted photos RB of NNP spotted on a hike . “ This is not exactly the speech at the Capitol I hoped to be giving after the NN , ” she VBD . “ But after a few weeks of taking selfies in the woods , I thought it MD be a good idea to come out . ” Most of NNP ’s speech was about Reid , the taciturn senator from Nevada who helped deliver the votes needed to pass NNP Obama ’s healthcare law . “ No matter how high he rose here in NNP , he never lost touch with the NNS and values he grew up with , ” she VBD . text: As I will document in this chapter , the third wave saw nativist populism firmly moving from the fringes to become normalized . Most of these parties had abandoned open xenophobia , rather dressing their messages within more acceptable rhetoric . In the UK for instance , the more toned down populist UK Independence Party was replacing the openly racist BNP , which I discussed in the previous chapter . Later , the Brexit Party took over the rollers for a while . In France , the National Rally ( previously named the National Front ) VBD renewed support under the leadership of the more composed - looking Marine Le Pen , who had replaced her more aggressive father Jean - Marie Le Pen . CD of the greatest successes of populist parties in the third wave came in the 2014 European Parliament elections . In Denmark , France and the UK populists surged to the very front . Five NNS later , populists entered the EP in RB greater numbers . Prior to the 2019 elections , European far - JJ populists had attempted to forge a continental alliance under the leadership of Italy ’s Matteo Salvini and Marine Le Pen in France . The US far - JJ strategist Steve Bannon was RB trying to unite European populists in his Brussels - VBN group called The Movement . Bannon described Brussels as the beating heart of the globalist project , and VBD he wanted to ‘ drive the stake through the vampire ’ until the whole NN started to disintegrate ( qtd in Lewis 2018 ) . However , as I discussed in the Introduction to this book , it has proven difficult to unite nationalists across borders in a meaningful NN , as each is primarily focused on domestic aspects . These parties have thus VBN difficulties in co-operating in the European Parliament and have , more or less , been split into at least three separate parliamentary groups . CD of their dividing issues was that of NNP . While Salvini , Le Pen and Orbán aligned with Vladimir Putin , especially due to his opposition to both the US and the EU , others were more wary of NNP , for instance the Scandinavians and those in the Baltics , as well as RB Kaczynski of Law and Justice in Poland . Euroscepticism was RB finding its NN to Germany with the rise of Alternative for Germany , which secured significant support in the 2017 parliamentary elections . In the third wave , such sentiments were indeed spreading much further RB in JJ of the more traditionally pro-EU NNS than they had done in the CD previous waves . Populism was RB on the rise in South NNP . The Chávismo regime in Venezuela had consolidated NN , incarcerated leading opposition figures , and firmly forced much of NN and civil society under their will . In 2017 , Chávez ’s successor , Nicolás Maduro , dissolved parliament and shifted authority over to the newly established Constituent Assembly , which adhered to the will of the Chávismo regime . Over in Greece , JJ kinds of populists were competing for NN . Landing more than a fourth of the vote in 2012 , the left - wing populist Syriza was sweeping across the country . When coming into NN three NNS later they for example had to rely on ANEL , a JJ xenophobic JJ - wing party . That was necessary for keeping the neo - Nazi , Golden Dawn , from NN . Over the course of the Euro NNP Syriza became more and more domesticated , gradually adhering to demands from EU creditors of implementing austerity . Left - wing populists RB rose up in Spain , where anti-austerity Podemos was contesting traditional politics , taking more than CD - fifth of the vote in the 2015 NN . The mainstream Popular Party , which had been formed in the wake of Franco ’s death , was already highly nationalist . Nationalism in Spain RB had a secessionist side , most notably in Catalonia and in the Basque country . Rough far - JJ movements had RB VBN difficulty in breaking through , perhaps because of Spain ’s relatively recent fascist history . However , in the second general NN of 2019 , far - JJ populist Vox party came in third place , winning 15 per cent of the vote , and landing fifty - CD out of 350 seats in parliament . This was RB a period of JJ contradictions . While most of the nativist populist parties were in this period getting rid of their openly xenophobic symbolism , this era RB saw several more militant and openly racist parties gaining support in JJ other European NNS . In Bulgaria the Attack Party was growing and the Jobbik movement in Hungary was at the NN still outright neo -Nazi . With JJ of these parties finding increased acceptability in society , RB discredited authoritarian leaders of the past were again being rhetorically resurrected . Jörg Haider of Austria , for instance , dismissed much of the discussion IN Austria ’s Nazi past , and leader of the Italian Lega , Matteo Salvini , openly voiced his admiration of Mussolini . In NNP , Vladimir Putin repeatedly moved to resurrect Stalin ’s reputation . Notorious policies that for a JJ while were collectively dismissed — such as of religious and racial segregation — were RB emerging to the NN again . Most horrendous in this third wave were several violent acts committed by far - JJ extremists . Amongst these were the attacks by Norwegian terrorist Anders Behring Breivik in 2011 , and Tomas Mair who murdered MP Jo Cox in the UK in CD . In 2019 , Muslims were targeted by a shooter in Christchurch in NNP Zealand , and another shooter turned on Latinos in the US border town of El Paso . All of these perpetrators were believers in the extremist - JJ NN NN called The Great Replacement . This is the belief that Muslims or other groups of migrants are actively plotting in secret to conquer the West in a hostile , albeit incremental , takeover . Instrumental for the rise of nativist populism in the third wave was RB the simultaneous growth of JJ NN , which provided for much faster distribution of both JJ NN and controversial populist views .

text: NNP - elect Donald NNP 's transition team VBD in a Tuesday conference call with reporters that retired Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn 's son is " no longer involved " in the NNP transition effort . " Until # Pizzagate proven to be JJ , it 'll remain a story , " Flynn Jr. posted to NNP . " The left seems to forget # PodestaEmails and the JJ ' coincidences ' tied to it . " As of Monday , Flynn Jr. had a NN transition email , CNN reported . Flynn himself RB shared a similar NN NN on NNP days before the November NN that claimed NNP was involved in sex crimes with NNS . text: How on NN did Donald NNP win the presidency when he lost the popular vote by such historic margins ? To put this in perspective : John Kerry lost the popular vote in 2004 by almost the same number of votes as Donald NNP 12 NNS later . This is not a JJ question , to be noodled over by disgruntled Democrats and JJ NNS . It lies at the heart of the likely impeachment of NNP himself , and it will dominate at least the next CD US elections . The answer is fundamental to our democratic culture of fair elections , the rule of law , the role of technology and the free NN . Now there are any numbers of factors that MD have swung 40,000 votes in three NNS – Michigan , Wisconsin and Pennsylvania – which created the catastrophic fluke of the NNP presidency in the electoral college . But there are no factors as JJ and persistent as a weaponized NNP – the trusted and entirely unregulated delivery vehicle for an astonishing amount of highly targeted disinformation . Without NNP , there MD have been no Pizzagate , and the hacked DNC emails MD have struggled to reach their intended audience . The strangely NNP - loving Green party MD never have tallied enough votes to skew those three battleground NNS towards NNP . All roads lead to NNP and the JJ NN that plundered its vast user NNS : Cambridge Analytica . Together the JJ network looks less IN a group of friends and more IN the Silk Road black NN of arms and drugs dealers . Thanks to the reporting of the Observer , the Guardian and Channel 4 , we now VBP that Cambridge Analytica MD happily arrange for a candidate to fall into a compromising scandal with a Ukraine prostitute or a bribery sting . As the now - suspended CEO , Alexander Nix , put it so well : “ It sounds a dreadful thing to VB , but these are things that do n’t necessarily VB to be JJ as RB as they ’re believed . ” In his snooty British accent , Nix is only saying – and converting into highly effective digital marketing – what NNP has RB believed : lies do n’t matter as RB as they ’re believed . So while it might seem grandiose for Nix to boast that he played a central role in getting NNP elected , he RB identifies several key truths that NNP supporters MD refuse to VB . RB , the use of posts from JJ activist groups that blur the lines between a campaign and outside groups . “ This stuff infiltrates the JJ community , but with no branding , so it ’s unattributable , untrackable , ” Nix helpfully explained to undercover reporters . NN laws will surely VB as a result of Nix ’s bragging and NNP ’s arrogant and inept response to this snowballing scandal . Nobody MD VB away with such brazenly JJ manipulation in TV ads . Why should they do so on NNP or any other part of the web ? Cambridge Analytica RB VBZ their NNS “ informed all the strategy ” of the NNP campaign , including use of the “ Crooked Hillary ” slur that NNP still deploys to this day . At this point , lots of NNP supporters – and JJ JJ pundits – VBP to VB that nobody MD be this powerful . No single firm MD have exerted this much influence . But that ignores the simple premise that has taken NNP to such epic heights until now : that we trust our friends as a source of NN far more than we have trusted traditional NN and other institutions . The NNP campaign – aided and abetted by Russian hackers and trolls , conservative billionaires , and the brainiacs of firms IN Cambridge Analytica – drove its disinformation through the NNS we VBP to trust : our friends . The evil geniuses of Cambridge Analytica were , as Channel 4 has shown , not nearly the geniuses they thought they were . Seriously , guys : when your NN is registered in Delaware , you should probably realize that you come under US jurisdiction . Besides , we now VBP that JJ firms hoovered up NNP ’s NNS and the JJ NN giant did n’t care . The end is surely nigh for Cambridge Analytica , and its key executives and investors can expect subpoenas in the near future . If the Democrats win back the NNP this NN , we can expect JJ laws to prevent unattributable , untrackable JJ ads on digital platforms in NN for the NN that will decide NNP ’s fate . But before we reach that point , NNP ’s future is already in serious doubt . It is now a polluted NN , where you have no idea if your friends are real , if their posts are disinformation , if the ads are legal , and if your user NNS is safe . You MD still trust your friends , but you wo n’t trust what they post on NNP . Advertising dollars will bleed away , removing the only thing NNP RB cares about . Developers will drift away because they wo n’t VB to work for a polluted brand . And the regulators will start interfering with JJ product launches and JJ takeover targets . If that sounds ridiculous , cast your NN back to the almighty position of Microsoft almost CD decades ago , when it ruled most of the computer screens , documents and emails we stared at all day . When the justice department challenged its monopoly NN , NNP NNP , his executives and his lawyers dug in with every denial and shred of outrage they MD muster . They lost their NN but avoided the NN ’s attempts to break them up , after George W Bush “ won ” the disputed 2000 NN . It did n’t much matter . Stripped of goodwill , with an eye on NN regulation , Microsoft turned into the NN it despised : IBM . Ubiquitous , boring and left behind . Only recently has Microsoft turned its reputation RB , but it ’s a far cry from its heyday in the late 1990s . It was a remarkable coincidence that NNPS himself turned to philanthropy at the same NN , rebuilding his reputation on a JJ scale among NNS who needed his extraordinary wealth far more than he did . All that has yet to play out for Mark Zuckerberg : the outraged denials , the JJ shaming , the polluted brand , the turn to philanthropy . NNP is unlikely to collapse , but its decline has already begun . He is only just discovering what everyone else learns when they come into NNP ’s vortex , willingly or not . There is no escape when your reputation is circling the drain alongside him .

text: The influential publication The Economist released its traditional end of NN edition where it predicts events of the coming NN . The 2017 edition is presented in a very occult fashion : A tarot deck modified with cryptic symbols . If you thought that CD was not a great NN , well The Economist does not seem too optimistic about the NN to come . Indeed , in its “ The NNP in 2017 ” cover , the publication predicts death and turmoil in a dark occult context , VBG tarot cards and cryptic symbolism . When The Economist released The NNP in 2015 cover , I simply had to write an extensive article about it because it alluded , through symbolism , to various agendas of the elite . Indeed , The Economist is not your typical magazine , it is a ‘ prestigious ’ publication owned by powerful NNS . As I ’ve written in the 2015 article : While some images on that 2015 cover referred to obvious events , others were extremely cryptic – RB ‘ coded ’ – as they were never satisfactorily explained . This NN ’s edition is RB more enigmatic . It uses the tarot to predict the NN to come . Here it is . The JJ thing PRP can VB about this cover is that it is occult . The tarot is indeed VBN to contain within its symbolism the entirety of occult mysteries transmitted by secret societies . RB , considering that the cards of the Major Arcana are RB referred to as “ trumps ” , it was a great NN to emphasize that next NN will be very influenced by NNP ’s NN . VBG tarot cards to predict the future , in a publication that is owned by the occult elite , is quite fitting . Through the centuries , several versions of the tarot were created . However , most of them contain the same symbolism which alludes to specific esoteric concepts . Occultists agree that the tarot originates from Ancient Egypt . The tarot is an extremely dense compilation of occult concepts and symbolism , encompassing Freemasonry , numerology , the kabbalah , and alchemy . The Economist ’s cover was inspired by the Rider - Waite deck which was published in 1909 . Here it is . The Rider - Waite deck was conceived by the prominent occultist A.E. Waite who was an initiate and a master of several secret societies . Therefore , by VBG the Rider - Waite deck to predict 2017 , The Economist reveals the JJ force that makes these predictions happen : The occult elite . Let ’s look at the cryptic symbolism VBN on each card . The JJ card of ‘ NN NNP ’ is The Tower . By doing so , the cover begins predictions on a rather grim note . Not unlike The Tower of the Rider - Waite deck , the card features a tower being destroyed by lightning from above , a reference to the Tower of Babel being destroyed by NNP . This card is usually associated with danger , NN , destruction , and liberation . On The Economist ’s cover , the tower is surrounded by mobs of NNS holding a red communist flag and a crucifix . Why are communists and Christians facing each other while the tower is being destroyed ? Is The Economist alluding to the CD forces that are VBN to have propelled NNP to NN – NNP and conservative Christianity ? Or does it maybe refer to the growing divide between CD opposite groups – globalists / liberals / socialists versus nationalist / religious / conservatives ? On the tower ’s door is nailed a piece of paper . This appears to be a reference to Martin Luther ’s Ninety - five Theses . A painting of Martin Luther nailing his Theses on the door of All Saints ’ Church in Wittenberg . Martin Luther ’s thesis criticized various aspects of Catholicism , a gesture that prompted Protestant Reformation . Is The Economist predicting a difficult NN for the Catholic Church ? Donald NNP is sitting on the globe while holding an orb and a scepter – objects referring to a monarchy . In other words , NNP is the king of the NN . Monarchy and democracy are JJ systems that are extremely JJ . The Economist appears to be predicting that NNP will rule the NN IN a monarch . Furthermore , why is this image associated the Judgement card ? The Economist ’s card looks nothing IN the Judgement card from the Rider - Waite deck which depicts the Angel Gabriel on Judgement Day as described by the Book of Revelation . The Book of Revelation mentions several times the term ‘ kings of the NNP ’ . They are sometimes VBN to worship Christ and in other passages , they are VBN to worship the Beast . When portrayed in a negative context , these ‘ kings of the NN ’ suffer the judgment symbolized in the seven seals , trumpets , and bowls , finally concluding with their defeat by the rider of the white horse in chapter CD . Strange fact : There ’s a white horse on the cover . Once again , The Economist ’s The NNP card looks nothing IN its Rider - Waite counterpart . In tarot , The NNP card represents an ending to a cycle of NN , a pause in NN before the next JJ cycle beginning with the fool . It is RB associated with the concept of ‘ unification ’ . On The Economist ’s version , we VBP images representing arts , literature , and theater floating above three monuments . CD of them feature classical architecture VBN in Rome , Greece , NNP DC and Paris ( the monument in the middle resembles the Panthéon ) . The Egyptian pyramid brings to the card a mystical , esoteric dimension . These three monuments perfectly represent the historical influence of the ‘ occult elite ’ on society . Claiming to be the guardians of the Mysteries originating from Ancient Egypt , passed down through secret societies such the Knights Templar , the Freemasons , the Rosicrucians and the Bavarian Illuminati , the elite has been the secret force behind profound cultural and JJ NNS . On The Economist ’s card , lines connect these the three buildings of NN with symbols representing popular culture . In other words , the occult elite produces a single and cohesive popular culture that is VBN throughout the NN . While The Hermit card in the Rider - Waite deck is rather simple , The Economist ’s version is dense and full of turmoil . It depicts hordes of NNS marching while holding flags rejecting the TTIP ( Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership ) , the TPP ( Trans - Pacific Partnership ) and the EU ( European Union ) . Other flags simply VBP ‘ STOP ’ and ‘ NO ’ which reflect general of globalization and the agenda surrounding it . Hermits live in seclusion of society and these NNS VBP to live in seclusion from the NN order . At the bottom NN of the card is a cracked globe , another ominous symbol referring to profound division and destruction . Silently overseeing the scene is the same hermit VBN on the Rider - Waite deck who holds a staff and a lantern . What does he represent ? Here is the esoteric meaning of The Hermit . The Hermit , therefore , represents the occult elite , the ‘ secret organizations ’ that have ruled the NN for centuries and concealed occult NN from the profane ( i.e. the masses ) . Is the hermit silently watching the masses getting excited about nationalism because it falls ultimately falls into a greater scheme ? No matter what the NN MD be , the next card is not very optimistic . This card can not be more ominous . Not unlike the Rider - Waite version , the card features a skeleton sitting on a white horse . On The Economist ’s version , a nuclear mushroom is in the background which probably alludes to tensions to come between nuclear powers IN the NN ( a mushroom was RB on the 2015 cover ) . Other calamities are VBN on the card such as mosquitoes ( a reference to zika - type viruses ? ) and a dead fish in a dried up river ( the growing NN NN IN the NN ? ) . Strange detail : The card features the same ‘ blazing NN ’ in the background VBN on The NNP card ( with inverted colors ) . This card is very similar to its Rider - Waite counterpart . In both NNS , the magician has CD hand towards the heavens and another towards the NN – a reference to the hermetic axiom “ as above , so below ” . In The Economist ’s version , the magician is wearing a VR ( virtual reality ) helmet while working a 3D printer . As Arthur C. Clark ’s third law stipulates : On this card , 3D printing appears to be a ‘ magical ’ solution to create low - cost housing solutions – an industry that is already ramping up . VR will undoubtedly be a JJ thing in 2017 as several NNS are set to be released in the coming NNS . The infinity symbol VBN above the magician can refer to the limitless possibilities of both technologies : PRP can create infinite virtual worlds while the other can greatly expand the limits of material resources . This card refers to the upcoming elections in three European nations : France , Germany and the Netherlands . Marine LePen , Angela Merkel , and Geert Wilders are attached to a spinning wheel next to NN ballots . In the Rider - Waite deck , the Wheel of Fortune card features an eight - spoked wheel – the Cycle of Necessity – an esoteric symbol referring to the cyclic nature of NN . The NN of politics is RB cyclic and , according to The Economist , a smiling Marine Le Pen is heading towards the top of the wheel while a pouting Merkel is upside down and heading down . To make things worse , Merkel is next to dark cloud while Le Pen is under a nice clear sky . Is Merkel heading towards a bitter defeat ? Will her controversial “ open door policy ” , which allowed the entrance of over a CD refugees in Germany in the past NNS , VB her to lose ? Conversely , will Le Pen profit from the nationalist momentum started by Brexit and the NN of NNP ? Will France become another powerful country ruled by the ‘ far - JJ ’ and nationalism ? While Le Pen ’s JJ party Le Front National VBD to be shunned and described as racist , it might gain JJ legitimacy in 2017 . Geert Wilders , who is another “ far - JJ ” candidate who is described by NN as being “ populist ” and “ racist ” . Things are looking up for him as well . While those who reject globalism might perceive this NN in JJ scenery as a victory , the symbolism of this card appears to VB : “ It is all part of the plan ” . Indeed , JJ parties , whether they be ‘ far - JJ ’ or ‘ far - left ’ are all part of the same ever - turning wheel , the “ cycle of necessity ” that puts into NN whoever is necessary at that specific NN . In other words , the momentum of nationalism might be planned by the elite to accomplish specific goals . In tarot , The Star card represents joy , optimism , and feeling connected with the divine . In The Economist ’s version , the faces of 15 young NNS appear inside yellow stars . I MD not identify any of these faces . Some of them appear to be in their early teens . Who are these specific young NNS ? Will they be rising stars in 2017 ? Why is there a shooting star in the center ? Strange card . The tarot is VBN by all yet it conceals , in plain sight , a NN that has been hidden from the ‘ profane ’ for centuries . The Economist ’s tarot cover accomplishes the same goal : It is published across the NN yet its JJ meaning will only be fully understood by few . The cover was heavily inspired by the tarot deck created by A.E Waite , a prominent occultist and founder of secret societies . By referring to this specific deck and by VBG its very hermetic symbolism , The Economist is pointing towards the JJ philosophy of those ruling the NN . IN the tarot , The NNP in 2017 predicts various trends to come while hiding , in symbolism , the JJ mechanisms at work . Indeed , several of these cards imply the existence of a ‘ hidden hand ’ , an outside force that does not simply observe what is happening – it is silently guiding the NN where it needs to VB .
