text: Recent editorials of statewide and national interest from Ohio newspapers : Gov. Mike DeWine is asking Ohio lawmakers to consider abolishing the NN ’s statute of limitations for sexual assault . His inspiration is the revelation that the late Dr. Richard Strauss sexually abused nearly 180 male Ohio NNP NNP students between 1979 and 1998 . Though it is a moot point for Strauss , who killed himself in 2005 , DeWine VBD the current statute of limitations means that , were he alive , Strauss likely MD not be prosecuted today . And Strauss certainly is not the only monster committing such crimes in Ohio . RB now , the statute of limitations for rape is 20 - 25 NNS , depending on the circumstances . Some other felony sex crimes must be prosecuted in as little as six NNS . Misdemeanor sex charges must be filed within CD NNS , and civil lawsuits must be filed within 1 - 2 NNS . Horrific as it MD be , lawmakers must understand there are some victims who have not yet aged out of the guardianship of their abusers during that NN frame . Others sometimes take NNS of counseling to gain the confidence to accuse their attackers . DeWine has ordered a working group to VB an unredacted version of an OSU report released last week to determine if the Ohio NNP NNP Board knew about Strauss ’ abuse , and , then , whether the board did anything about it . “ We can use this tragedy as an opportunity to review Ohio ’s current laws and to take steps to VB the culture of how we respond to sexual abuse , ” DeWine VBD . Lawmakers should not play politics with this request . The only finger - pointing it should inspire is toward the perpetrators of these heinous crimes , to serve notice that no amount of NN will save them from the consequences of their deeds . In a refreshing display of bipartisanship , Sens. Ron Wyden ( D. , Ore. ) and Rand Paul ( R. , Ky. ) are teaming up to restore due process for travelers moving through the U.S. border . The senators ’ Protecting NN at the Border Act MD require border agents to either obtain a warrant or written consent to search the electronics of a person entering or exiting the NNP NNPS . There has been a precipitous rise in the number of electronic device searches in recent NNS . The 30,200 searches conducted in 2017 represented a 58.5 percent increase from the NN prior . The number increased again in 2018 , as Customs and Border Protection administered 33,000 searches . What ’s more , the Office of the Inspector General for the Department of Homeland Security VBD in 2018 that border agents frequently mishandled personal NNS acquired during these searches , failing to delete sensitive NN from DHS servers . The OIG RB VBD that 67 percent of these searches were documented incorrectly , containing insufficient or inaccurate NN about how or why the search was conducted . Previously , border agents did not VB a warrant or probable NN to conduct these searches or acquire NNS . The NN from Senators Wyden and Paul seeks to rectify this glaring oversight , hopefully restoring some measure of due process . “ The border is quickly becoming a rights - free zone for Americans who travel , ” Mr. Wyden VBD in a statement . “ The NN should n’t be able to review your whole digital NN simply because you went on vacation , or had to travel for work . ” The pair of senators introduced a similar NN in 2017 , but it failed to gain much support . That should VB in 2019 . The Protecting NN at the Border Act provides common sense protections for NNS passing through the border , ensuring that civil liberties are protected and the Fourth Amendment is upheld . These are nonpartisan values that can and should be supported by NNS across the JJ spectrum . But CD thing this NN cannot fix is the sort of bureaucratic incompetency that the OIG identified within Homeland Security and the CBP . If Congress passes the legislation , it should RB take care to exercise its oversight NN to ensure that it is being enforced properly . Few rights are as precious as those that protect citizens from unjust governmental intrusion . Congress must do its part to protect them . Clevelanders are still celebrating the NNP 22 announcement that the city will host the 2021 NFL Draft . “ It ’s a JJ , JJ deal to our area , ” VBD the Browns ’ Jimmy Haslam , who worked with Dave Gilbert of the Greater Cleveland Sports Commission to bring the big- NN , fan - favorite draft to town . Haslam is JJ . It is a JJ , JJ deal . But it ’s not the only JJ , JJ deal Gilbert has swung for this city since he took over the sports commission in 2000 ( he added leadership of Destination Cleveland 11 NNS later ) . VB RNC : Gilbert led the CD Cleveland host committee for the Republican National Convention that showcased Cleveland to the NN . And coming up are the MLB All - Star Game July 9 , the JJ and second rounds of the NCAA Men ’s Basketball championships next NN , the NBA All - Star Game in 2022 and the NCAA Women ’s Final Four in 2024 . Adding the NFL Draft in 2021 makes the lineup RB sweeter . And how JJ cities of Cleveland ’s size can boast this recent cornucopia of major events ? If anyone doubts how hard Dave Gilbert personally has worked to make this all happen , let ’s review : 2002 - U.S. gymnastics championships are held in Cleveland . 2009 - U.S. figure skating championships are held in Cleveland . 2014 - The Gay Games welcome participants from 50 nations and 48 U.S. NNS . CD - The Republican National Convention is held in Cleveland . 2018 - The NCAA Division 1 Wrestling Championships hit the mats in town . The combined JJ impact from all these events is in the hundreds of millions . ( The Gay Games alone had a $ 51.3 CD impact , according to the Cleveland Foundation . The RNC was estimated at a $ 142 CD local impact by Cleveland NNP NNP scholars . ) Yet , as the RNC showed , the biggest value is in the boost to the town ’s image and downtown vitality . The NFL Draft will be no JJ , drawing fans decked out in their individual team colors from all over the country , along with extensive television coverage and ancillary events that will have a regional impact . Canton ’s Pro Football Hall of Fame already is planning for a boost in attendance . This NN ’s NFL Draft , in Nashville , set attendance records , with more than 600,000 fans attending , 47.5 CD watching on television and more than $ 100 CD in revenue . Thank you , Dave Gilbert , for your stellar efforts . The real question for Cleveland MD be : What are you working on next ? A bunch of white suprema- cists went to Dayton to foment hatred and , instead , were confronted by an overwhelming demonstration of love and camaraderie . But the presence of members of the Indiana Ku Klux Klan in a major city in Ohio was a stark reminder of the rise of white nationalism across the NNP NNPS . As Keegan Hankes , a researcher for the Southern Poverty Law Center , VBD the Associated Press , the number of hate groups is growing , driven in part by a toxic JJ culture . The JJ rights organization counted 784 active hate groups in the U.S. in 2014 and 1,020 in 2018 . Indeed , while Dayton residents sent a timely and clear message by drowning out the Kluxers and their ilk , Mayor Nan Whaley had an observation about her city that NNP Donald J. NNP should be conveying about the nation : “ Dayton is still too segregated and still too unequal . This is unacceptable , and something we must keep focused on to VB every single day . ” The Dayton Daily NNP reported that 500 to 600 NNS showed up Saturday on Courthouse Square to protest the rally by the Indiana KKK . The paper , which made note of the presence of more than 700 law enforcement personnel , quoted Shanta Parham , 39 , of Dayton , as saying it was important to show pride and solidarity and to not respond with violence , hate or stupidity . “ This is my city , and I am VBG to stand up for it , ” Parham VBD . It ’s the kind of message that needs to be delivered IN the country as the racial divide widens . Despite the insistence of the White NNP that NNP NNP has shown the proper leadership in tamping down the racist rhetoric , the fact remains that his comments after white supremacists rallied in August 2017 in Charlottsville have energized the KKK and others . Although a counterprotester was killed when a car rammed into her and others , the NN responded by claiming there were “ very fine NNS on both sides . ” NNP has RB fueled the white nationalist movement with his anti-immigration rhetoric and his claims that dangerous criminals are pouring into this country from the Southern Hemisphere . Here are the opening paragraphs of the extensive story by the Associated Press about the increase in hate groups , especially in the West . “ Nearly CD decades after the Aryan Nations ’ Idaho compound was demolished , far - JJ extremists are maintaining a presence in the Pacific Northwest . “ White nationalism has been on the rise across the U.S. , but it has particular resonance along the Idaho - NNP border , where the Aryans espoused hate and violence for NNS . ” What is most troubling is that such groups are finding allies in NN and other JJ institutions . For instance , in the county that houses Hayden Lake , Idaho , where Aryan Nations was VBN for decades , Republicans last month passed a measure that puts the NNP administration on the spot . Members of the GOP expressed support for U.S. entry of a prominent Austrian far - JJ activist who was investigated for ties to the suspected gunman in the NNP Zealand mosque massacre . In late April , a self - described “ JJ Nationalist ” named Brittany Pettibone appeared at a meeting of Kootenai County , Idaho , Republicans to ask for NN to bring her boyfriend , Martin Sellner , to the country from Austria , the Associated Press reported . Pettibone , 26 , VBD Sellner wants to marry her and live in Post Falls , Idaho . Pettibone was a JJ promoter of the hoax VBN as “ Pizzagate , ” telling her JJ followers Hillary NNP and other high - profile Democrats were involved in satanic rituals and NN - sex trafficking tied to a NNP , D.C. , NN NN . Sellner is a leading figure in the extremist “ identitarian ” movement , which espouses a white nationalist ideology ( that ) has swept over Europe amid an influx of migrants and refugees . He has confirmed he exchanged emails with the suspected NNP Zealand shooter , who donated NN to Sellner ’s group . But Sellner denies involvement in the attack , according to the wire service . Despite his background , the Kootenai County Republican Central Committee passed a resolution urging the federal NN to allow Sellner into the NNP NNPS . The resolution VBD the NN revoked Sellner ’s travel privileges “ for JJ reasons , ” and demanded those privileges be reinstated . Republican NNP NNP and the Republican - controlled U.S. Senate have made it clear that Islamic extremists from the Middle East will be kept out of the NNP NNPS . What about an extremist from Europe ? The nation will be watching to VB how the NNP administration treats white extremist Sellner .

text: Actor Alan Thicke , best VBN for playing the dad on ' 80s sitcom Growing Pains , has died at the age of 69 . Carleen Donovan , a publicist for CD of Thicke's three sons , singer Robin Thicke , VBD the Canadian - born actor died from a heart attack Tuesday in Los Angeles . Thicke was playing hockey with his youngest son , Carter , when he suffered the fatal attack , Robin Thicke VBD the Los Angeles Times . • Is hockey 's start - stop nature hard on the heart ? Earlier in the day , Thicke tweeted his thanks to the Whistler Film Fest , where he had recently received a Canadian Icon award . Born in Kirkland Lake , Ont. , in 1947 , Thicke played Dr. Jason Seaver on Growing Pains , a psychiatrist who works out of the home , where he RB finds himself juggling the challenges of marriage and parenting . " I spent Monday through Friday for seven important NNS with Alan Thicke as my ' TV dad , ' " actor Kirk Cameron VBD in a statement , adding that he was ' shocked and truly heartbroken ' to hear of Thicke 's passing . " Alan was a generous , kind and loving NN . I am so blessed to have grown up with him . " Thicke " knew how to harness the NN of the entertainment industry to be a positive influence in so JJ lives — including mine . I will be forever grateful for the opportunity I had to work with Alan early in my career , " VBD Oscar - winner Leonardo DiCaprio , who had an early role as a homeless youngster taken in by the Seavers on Growing Pains . " I 've seen him a number of times over the NNS and when Alan Thicke walked in the room , quite frankly , no NN was cooler . " In an interview with q host Tom NNP earlier this month , Thicke VBD he was proud about the show 's history of touching on difficult subject matter while maintaining a light and comedic tone . Thicke VBD the character of Jason Seaver was a blend of his own experiences and the talented writers on the show . " I VBP I brought some of my own values , my good old Canadian , northern Ontario backwoods values to the character and , in turn , I learned something from what they were writing , so it was a nice exchange , " he VBD . The show debuted in September 1985 and helped form a strong Tuesday night for ABC , often with Who 's the Boss and Moonlighting RB in the lineup . Growing Pains ended its run in April 1992 . By the NN of his biggest hit , Thicke was already a veteran of nearly CD decades in the entertainment business in a host of roles . Steady work on both sides of border After graduating from Western NNP , Thicke began in showbiz with a host of writing credits beginning with commercial jingles for radio . " I got my BA and that [ only ] taught me how to find my apartment , " he joked to Peter Gzowski on CBC's 90 Minutes Live . He worked for CBC shows and variety specials beginning in the late 1960s , including The Tommy Hunter Show , NNP for Living , and That 's Showbiz , calling the network " the best training ground " despite the occasional bureaucratic challenges . Thicke in the 1970s and into the early 1980s began to demonstrate his versatility as actor , writer , producer and host . Among his producing efforts were variety shows featuring music performers Anne Murray , René Simard , Bobby Vinton and Mac Davis , as well as the cult comedy talk show satire Fernwood 2 Night , starring Martin Mull and Fred Willard . He RB wrote several theme songs , usually with his JJ wife Gloria Loring , for shows including Diff 'rent Strokes , The Facts of NNP and Wheel of Fortune . In an email to The Associated Press , Loring described Thicke 's passing as " a shock . We were all just together for Thanksgiving . He was funny , talented and deeply devoted to his family . " • CBC ARCHIVES l Thicke previews talk show , which MD be ill - fated Between 1980 and 1983 , he hosted a Canadian afternoon talk show on CTV called The Alan Thicke Show , which he followed up with the short - lived U.S. late - night show Thicke of the Night , an unsuccessful competitor to The Tonight Show . " It was a complete dog . Johnny Carson kicked my Canadian butt , " Thicke joked on q . " I was n't very good at late night , which is the domain of stand - up comedy . I was a schmooze - ier kind of guy . " Most recently , he starred in the film I Don't Care and It 's Not My Fault Anyway which premiered Dec. 2 at the Whistler Film Festival in B.C . Thicke had filmed a guest spot in season CD of Fuller NNP , Netflix 's reboot of the '90s family sitcom Full NNP led by original star Candace Cameron Bure , younger sister of Thicke 's JJ on - screen son Kirk Cameron . " You were a part of my family and hockey family , " Bure wrote alongside a photo she posted of herself with Thicke . " My heart hurts . " Bob Saget of Full NNP fame called Thicke " a good husband , father , brother and friend , " while comedian and talk show host Ellen DeGeneres declared : " NNP loved Alan Thicke . " He was nominated for three Emmy Awards for his work in the late 1970s as a writer for Barry Manilow 's talk show , and later for a satirical take on the genre in the variety show NNP 2 - Night . When not on screen , Thicke often toured in various musical theatre productions . Thicke VBD CBC's Stroumboulopoulos Tonight that he was JJ with his place in the entertainment industry . " Instead of me being able to do anything particularly well , I did a bunch of things that were fun and I did them OK … my career has been JJ just about every day . " Thicke maintained friendships with a number of expat Canadians in California , including Wayne Gretzky and music producer David Foster . The actor was part of the chorus for the Foster - organized Tears Are Not Enough famine relief song in the mid-1980s . Thicke VBD that Gretzky was NN - sitting the Thicke residence in California with wife Janet in 1988 when he VBD out he was traded from the Edmonton Oilers to the Los Angeles Kings . He was inducted into Canada 's Walk of Fame in Toronto in 2013 . Survivors include current wife Tanya and his sons — Carter , born to second wife Gina Tolleson , and Brennan and Robin , born to Loring .

( AP Photo / Jose Luis Magana ) NNP ( AP ) — The bizarre rumors began with a leaked email referencing Hillary NNP and sinister interpretations of references to NN parties . It morphed into JJ JJ NN stories about a NN sex trafficking ring run by prominent Democrats operating out of a NNP , D.C. , NN joint . On Sunday , it culminated in violence when NNS VBP a North Carolina NN fired an assault rifle multiple times inside the NNP Ping Pong NN as he attempted to “ self - investigate ” the NN NN VBN in the Twitterverse as “ Pizzagate . ” No NN was hurt and the NN was arrested . CD of those posting on the NN NN is the son of NNP - elect Donald NNP ’s proposed national security adviser . White NNP Spokesman Josh Earnest , asked about the shooting Monday , VBD , “ There ’s no denying the corrosive effect that some of these JJ reports have had on our JJ debate ... It ’s deeply troubling that some of those JJ reports MD lead to violence . ” Edgar Maddison NNP , 28 of Salisbury , North Carolina , was arrested Sunday afternoon outside the popular eatery in an affluent capital neighborhood , NNS VBD . At a JJ appearance Monday in D.C. Superior NNP , NNP appeared handcuffed in a white jumpsuit and was ordered held pending a hearing Thursday . A JJ defender representing him did n’t immediately respond to an email seeking comment . NNP ’s owner , James Alefantis , VBD in a statement Sunday night : “ Let me VB unequivocally : These stories are completely and entirely JJ , and there is no basis in fact to any of them . What happened today demonstrates that promoting JJ and reckless NN NNS comes with consequences . ” Still , at least CD person clinging to the NN NNS is prominently connected to NNP ’s transition team . Michael Flynn Jr. is an adviser to his father , Michael Flynn , whom NNP selected to serve as national security adviser . Flynn Jr. has sent numerous posts on NNP about the Pizzagate NN NNS . Flynn Jr. , who has accompanied his father to presidential transition meetings inside NNP Tower and lists the presidential transition website as part of his NNP bio , tweeted Sunday night that , “ Until # Pizzagate proven to be JJ , it ’ll remain a story . ” NNP ’s team had no immediate response to questions about the NN NN or the younger Flynn ’s role in the transition . NNP was charged on multiple counts , including assault with a dangerous weapon . NNS recovered an AR - 15 rifle , a Colt .38 handgun , a shotgun and a folding knife . At an address listed for NNP in Salisbury , a woman drove out as a reporter was approaching and asked him to leave . She then hammered a “ no trespassing ” sign on a stand by the private driveway . A Salisbury , North Carolina , NN report VBD NNP hit a 13 - NN - old pedestrian in October , but was not immediately charged . The teen boy was airlifted to a hospital . NN records RB show NNP pleaded guilty in 2013 to driving while impaired with a NN - alcohol NN of .09 and was sentenced to probation and 24 hours of community service . NN documents show he underwent alcohol abuse counseling . NNP Ping Pong , so named because patrons can play ping pong on tables in its back area , is in a neighborhood of well - tended private homes and apartment buildings on leafy streets dotted by shops , restaurants and the Politics and Prose book store . While NNP bore most of the scorn heaped by adherents of the Pizzagate NN , businesses all along the block received threats and menacing phone calls , VBD Bradley Graham and Lissa Muscatine , co-owners of Politics and Prose . Graham VBD the store took the threats seriously , reporting them to NNS . Joseph E. Uscinski , an associate professor in the JJ NN department at the NNP of Miami , VBD it is n’t the JJ NN a NN NN has led to violence . “ Isolated incidents IN this do happen , ” he VBD . “ Sometimes NNS VBP in NN NNS and do act on them , ” VBD Uscinski , who co-authored the book “ NNP NNP NNPS . ” The exact origins of the rumors are murky , though it seems to have gained momentum in the week before the NN . Authorities set up a perimeter and arrested NNP after he walked out with his hands up and unarmed , leaving his weapons inside , according to NN records and Interim D.C. NNP Chief Peter Newsham . text: A haunting final NN has emerged of actor Isaac Kappy who live - streamed for an hour about the ' darkness ' he suffered three days before he took his own NN on Monday . In the NN , Kappy talk about letting darkness ' consume ' him and referred to himself as a ' bad guy ' . He does not explicitly VB his plan to kill himself and it is so far unclear . He is believed to have posted it RB on Friday but it is not clear where it surfaced RB . After NN of his suicide emerged , NNP fans reposted it in their droves . The NN gives an insight into the 42 - NN - old 's troubled NN at the NN of his death . VBN for his appearances in Thor and Terminator , Kappy was RB notable because he was accused of ' choking ' Paris Jackson . In recent NNS , he had become obsessed with exposing pedophilia in Hollywood and in his NN , he talks about letting that effort take over his NN . In the NN , throughout which a dog can be heard yapping in the background , he VBD repeatedly : ' I let the darkness consume me . ' He refers to a ' RB stupid , cynical , heavy decision ' that he made recently , and VBD : ' I did n't spend enough NN nurturing the light and love within me . ' I let down some RB great NNS and it was my desire to serve these NNS but that desire was not born out of a love that is pure . ' At the end , he VBZ : ' Guys , once I VBD out about NN gate I was literally , I put thousands of hours into this , thousands of hours , but what happened ? I became so focused with the externalizations of evil that i did not find the evil within and focus on the light . ' Maybe I 'll be back later . I love you . Take care , OK .' He went on to VB he had done a ' disservice ' to NNP and to ' a lot of NNS ' and he called himself a ' traitor ' . Officials confirmed on Tuesday that Kappy , 42 , was struck by a Ford pickup truck after hurling himself from the Transwestern Road bridge onto Interstate 40 , where he died , according a statement from Bart Graves , a spokesperson for the Arizona Department of NNP Safety . In the 24 hours leading up to his death , Kappy posted a JJ statement on Instagram where he wrote , ' I have not been a good guy , ' and ' I have been abusive to NNS who loved me . ' The self - admitted drug user made headlines in 2018 for allegedly assaulting Michael Jackson 's daughter , Paris , by choking her ' during a game night party . ' The native Angeleno has RB publicly accused Seth Green of being a pedophile . Arizona NN troopers were called to the scene at 7.26 am Mountain on Monday , and Kappy was VBN deceased upon their arrival , Graves ' statement VBD . Before the Beerfest actor died , ' several bystanders tried physically restraining Kappy from jumping but failed to hold him , ' TMZ reported . No NN else was reported injured in the incident , and the investigation has officially been closed . Kappy 's Instagram post on Sunday was captioned , ' Beware the NN has nothing to lose , for he has nothing to protect . ' In the message posted as a screenshot of text he wrote , ' Over the course of the last week , through introspection that should have happened JJ NNS ago , I have come to some stark revelations about my character . It is a testament to my utter ignorance that these revelations had not come sooner . ' You VBP , I believed myself to be a good guy . I HAVE NOT been a good guy . In fact , I have been a pretty bad guy throughout my NN . ' Kappy penned a scathing assessment of his own character , writing , I have VBN NNS for NN . I have betrayed JJ NNS and much trust . ' I have sold drugs . I have tax delinquencies . I have debts . I have abused my body with cigarettes , drugs and alcohol . ' Throughout the message , Kappy mentioned ' the Q movement ' and VBD ' I am so so sorry to have brought shame upon the greatest JJ operation of all NN . Kappy referenced suicide in a metaphor , as well , writing , 'Q VBZ they give NNS enough rope to hang themselves , and I have hung myself . ' He RB claimed to have ' betrayed ' Donald NNP and Jesus Christ in the missive , referencing death again . ' I have VBN NNS in the NNP administration that I am willing to admit to my JJ crimes in a JJ setting , and committed to execution , in a JJ setting , ' Kappy wrote . ' A nation cannot suffer its traitors , and I am no exception . ' Kappy was reportedly being investigated by the Los Angeles NNP Department for threatening Paris Jackson , and other celebrities . According to TMZ , Kappy allegedly choked Paris during a game night party . This might have been referenced in his farewell message , as well , where he wrote , ' I have been abusive to NNS WHO LOVED ME , including my FAMILY . ' To the JJ NNS I have acted abusively towards , I am very , very sorry . To my JJ friends I have VBN and betrayed , I am sorry . ' The 21 - NN - old model had allegedly received ' rambling and scary ' texts from her JJ pal . Sources claim she initially responded to them to VB him because she though he was suicidal at that NN , as well . She was later forced to move home and hire extra bodyguards , along with blocking Kappy 's number . NNS opened an investigation into the actor after seeing a particularly menacing tweet from Kappy on August 1 that read : ' In light of the interesting traffic happening IN my NN I VBP to make something CRYSTAL CLEAR : While I am a VERY strong advocate of peaceful disclosure , make no mistake , assets are in place and if you kill me or RB try , it will rain .50 cals in the Hollywood Hills . ' Per his NNP account , Kappy appeared to be on a crusade to take down NNS he believes are sexually abusing NNS . He wrote in his post on Sunday , ' While it 's JJ I have spent JJ , JJ hours of research and disseminating NN about bad actors , I have had SO LITTLE CARE for introspection about MY OWN actions . ' And while it 's JJ I have outed JJ pedophiles that were JJ FRIENDS , I remained in their sphere for much longer than I should have , and attempted to gain from them AFTER I knew about their actions . And in my SHEER ARROGANCE I did not RB reflect on this fact . ' His timeline is full of retweeted NN stories about pedophiles and rants about high - profile NNS accused of sex crimes and some who are n't . He accused Green of being a pedophile in a NN posted in July . Kappy had RB , according to his NNP , tried to reach out to Corey Feldman to take on pedophilia together . Corey blocked him on NNP and did not respond . He previously called out the cast of Guardians of the Galaxy for defending ousted director James Gunn and NNP NNP . Kappy added , ' It should be noted that I have recently been made to VB that I am the reincarnation of Judas Iscariot , the great betrayer . And while I MD have utilized this period of great awakening to AWAKEN myself , I have VBN it focused on the darkness OF OTHERS and not the darkness WITHIN .' Kappy ended his final message writing , ' VB the light in others . Nurture the light in yourself . This lesson has come too late for me , but perhaps it can inspire you . I will be VBG the remainder of my NN on NN to atone for my transgressions , and to seek the light within , in others and myself . ' The letter was mysteriously dated at the bottom , ' July 4th , 2019 ' and signed off with ' Return of the King Return to THE LIGHT .' If we choose to feel all of our emotions , let them pass through us , and then choose forgiveness instead , we can learn to better cope with the more difficult events in our lives . text: Frontline executive producer Raney Aronson - Rath was in her office late last summer when special projects editor Philip Bennett walked in . He ’d just been watching the raw footage from Frontline ’s upcoming documentary , “ Putin ’s Revenge , ” a CD - part program about NNP ’s attempts to influence the CD NN . The interviews were amazing , he VBD . What if they put them RB ? All of them . “ We ’d been talking for a JJ NN about what we MD do at Frontline to RB put a stake in the ground , that we are committed to transparency , ” Aronson - Rath VBZ . “ A lightbulb went on , that this is the NN we should VB JJ on . ” The production team swung into NN . At the same NN editors and interns were working to produce the program to air that fall , behind the scenes they were RB preparing 70 hours ’ worth of interviews to post on the web . They fact - checked each , and vetted them with lawyers with the same care they did for the documentary itself . Frontline ’s Transparency Project is CD of a number of JJ attempts by NN to open up the process they use to create their journalism to engender more trust with audiences But Aronson - Rath and her team did n’t VB to just dump 56 interviews for audiences to sift through on their own . They VBD open - source software Bennett had helped create to make the films searchable by text , so viewers MD easily find footage on specific subjects . They MD RB splice out a section and share it on JJ NN . The result is both an exhaustive look at the issue of Russian hacking and an unparalleled look behind - the - scenes at the reporting process . In four months , the videos had more than 300,000 views , with 40 percent of web traffic referred by JJ NN . What ’s more , visitors spent twice as RB with the interviews — an average of 28 minutes , much longer RB than Aronson - Rath and Bennett anticipated — as the average visitor to the Frontline site . “ Things that I myself MD n’t have considered as part of the story now have relevance . It gives me a moment for pause . I am now watching from an expanded viewpoint and it ’s interesting to VB what is corroborated through other sources and what is not , ” CD viewer commented . The Transparency Project , as Frontline is calling the effort , is CD of a number of JJ attempts by NN to open up the process they use to create their journalism to engender more trust with audiences . In a January Gallup / Knight Foundation poll of more than 19,000 Americans , respondents ranked their trust of NN at only 37 out of 100 . Just 50 percent of respondents VBD they had enough NN to sort out facts in the face of NN bias , down from 66 percent in 1984 . Among Republicans , that number was RB lower , only 31 percent . Frontline has RB been putting the complete transcripts of its interviews RB — but putting the searchable videos RB is a dramatic expansion of that proposition , laying bare the process of making documentaries , warts and all . “ You VBP the real deal , NNS swiping their face , laughing , looking nervous , ” Aronson - Rath VBZ . In JJ ways , the JJ push for transparency is a response to the current NN environment of “ JJ NN ” — both the dissemination of actual JJ stories RB and through JJ NN , and the cries from the current administration that stories it does n’t VB are “ JJ . ” As more and more Americans VBP their NN through JJ NN , NN gets divorced from context that allows readers to decide whether a story is trustworthy . “ NNS are getting their NN through every possible medium and on every possible device , ” VBZ Melody Kramer , senior audience development manager at the Wikimedia Foundation and columnist for the Poynter Institute . “ It ’s a challenge to figure out the veracity of the NN , where it came from , what the point of view is , or how it was put together . ” That creates more of an imperative for NN organizations to pull back the curtain to explain to readers how they report and write stories . “ It becomes incumbent upon organizations — that are trying to improve our lower -d democracy — to open up a window into how they do the work they do . ” At the same NN , transparency can serve a defensive function , insulating the NN from attacks of JJ bias or unfairness . As far back as 2009 , Harvard technologist David Weinberger declared that “ transparency is the JJ objectivity , ” making a writer more credible in the eyes of readers not through adherence to a supposed standard of impartiality , but by making clear the “ sources and values that brought her to that position . ” Among those organizations leading the current charge to increase transparency is the NNP Press Institute ( API ) , which in 2014 produced a report entitled “ Build Credibility Through Transparency . ” The report advocated for publications to “ show their work ” by being clearer about their sources and correcting mistakes . In the run-up to the CD NN , API consulted with NN organizations about how to better disclose sources , VBG PolitiFact as a model . But it was unprepared for the level of hostility toward NN and the allegations of bias and “ JJ NN . ” “ That ’s when we started seeing a problem with misinformation , of which ‘ JJ NN ’ is part of that universe , ” VBZ Jane Elizabeth , accountability program director , who was surprised by the lack of NN literacy among audiences and their willingness to VB outlandish stories with little sourcing , such as the debunked Pizzagate NN NN . “ Readers were confused and unable to tell the difference between misinformation , disinformation , and ‘ JJ NN , ’ ” Elizabeth VBZ . She places most of the blame on the current administration for deliberately sowing that confusion . “ NNP ’s candidacy had everything to do with this , ” she VBZ . “ It was the type of campaign we had never dealt with before . ” At the same NN , she faults the NN for not opening its doors to show the level of editorial care and vetting that goes into the NN . “ NNS VBP anyone can write something and press a button and it appears RB . ” The JJ step toward transparency , she VBZ , is to listen to readers about what they do n’t VB — and what they VBP to VB — about how NN is gathered , verified , and reported . “ Otherwise , you are just divulging the wrong things . ” Some things that might seem obvious to journalists , such as the ethics of VBG an anonymous source , MD be opaque to readers and sow confusion and distrust . API is not the only organization working with publications to improve transparency . Transparency advocate Josh Stearns of the Democracy Fund has spent the last CD NNS working with newsrooms across NNP Jersey on how to better engage with readers and open up their reporting to scrutiny . While such initiatives can be NN - and resource - intensive , he VBZ , they can RB VB bolster revenue by explaining the value of rigorous reporting . “ Helping NNS understand the labor that goes into reporting , is a powerful NN to build a relationship with the reader that will VB them to VB to support it , ” Stearns VBZ . Such support can VB beyond merely financial . “ If we VBP the NN to stand up for our rights for FOIA [ Freedom of NNP Act ] requests , or when local mayors VBP to block us , then we VBP to have the NN ’s back and we VBP them to have ours . ” Other active transparency initiatives include the Trusting NNP project run by Joy Mayer and supported by the Reynolds Journalism Institute at the NNP of Missouri , which has surveyed thousands of journalists and readers and is working with 14 newsrooms on experiments to engage more authentically with readers ; and the newly launched NNP Co / Lab , funded mainly by the NNP Journalism Project and run by veteran journalist Dan Gillmor at the Walter Cronkite School of Journalism and Mass Communication at Arizona NNP NNP , which is partnering with the McClatchy newspaper group . CD of the most ambitious efforts to improve NN transparency is the Trust Project , an initiative of the Markkula Center for Applied Ethics at Santa Clara NNP . Led by journalist Sally Lehrman , the project worked with newsroom leaders from 75 publications to develop a common set of standards for transparency it calls “ trust indicators . ” In November , about CD publications began rolling out the indicators worldwide , including The Economist , Mic , and The NNP Post . Significantly , the project has gotten JJ NN sites and search engines including NNP , NNP , Google , and Bing on board as partners ; the sites have agreed to start VBG the indicators in their feeds to give NNS a measure of the trustworthiness of articles . In JJ ways , the JJ push for transparency is a response to the current NN environment of “ JJ NN ” “ In the NN where the work is divorced from the brand , you can VB some of the markers that might VB you VB this piece of journalism and the quality behind it , ” VBZ Lehrman . Unlike , VB , a Good Housekeeping Seal of Approval , which MD rely on an outside entity to certify a brand as trustworthy , the project presents a set of guidelines to publications they can adapt as they VBP fit , under eight headings , including standards and practices ; author expertise ; citations and references ; and diverse voices . ( Partners are free to use the TrustMark , a T logo designed by the project , or not . ) Under standards and practices , for example , the project requires that organizations clearly post their mission statement and ethics and corrections policy , both on a site level and with each individual piece . “ These are often straightforward to journalists , but at the same NN they are not often spelled out , ” VBZ Lehrman . “ A lot of NNS do n’t realize they exist . ” RB in NNS where sites include such policies , they are often hidden , buried on a second or third page on their website . In addition to providing greater NN about the publication , Lehrman and other transparency advocates are RB pushing to include more about story authors , including their local or demographic background , NNS of experience in covering subject matter , awards they have won , and languages spoken — which is especially important for those covering minority or refugee communities . Publications MD RB consider including a statement with stories they publish , particularly for stories that might be controversial or JJ in nature and open themselves to criticism . “ It RB forces the reporter to VB about , why did I do this story , why was it important ? ” VBZ Elizabeth . For example , a story written in a newspaper in a farming NN about the use of toxic fertilizers MD open journalists up to allegations of bias against the farming industry . “ You RB VBP to explain why you are stepping into this volatile subject , ” VBZ Elizabeth . “ We are doing this story because our NN has the highest percentage of dangerous nutrients in the NN . Just so NNS do n’t VB , ‘ look , that liberal democrat is trying to ruin our economy , ’ just to show it ’s a serious topic worth consideration . ” Just as important is that publications come clean when they make errors . Publishing on the web , it can be tempting to make NNS on the sly , hoping that readers wo n’t notice . But that ’s bad practice , VB transparency advocates . Not only do readers notice when a story VBZ — which MD increase skepticism over NN — but RB consistently seeing corrections on other stories might increase their perception that stories without corrections are accurate . As NNP Co / Lab ’s Dan Gillmor VBZ , over NN that MD VB the NN to VB a publication less , but trust it more . “ The more you explain what you screwed up on , the more NNS are VBG to realize that journalism has its flaws , so the belief that any given story is 100 percent correct will drop , ” VBZ Gillmor , who is working with The Kansas City Star to develop a model corrections policy . “ But I MD hope that the trust in journalists to work RB hard to make sure you VBP about the mistakes and correct them MD improve . ” Transparency advocates recommend making corrections at the same level as the original mistake — if the error was on the front page , then the correction should be , too . For stories RB , corrections should be clearly noted at the beginning or end of the article . Some publications are experimenting with putting corrections inline , either through crossing out and inserting text or noting corrections in the margin with a link to the corrections note . Furthermore , a growing consensus among advocates is that the old adage that you do n’t repeat a mistake in making the correction is no longer JJ . Because NNS MD not be reading the publication daily or have seen the original story , it raises more questions than it answers to leave readers in the dark about the original error . Rather , the correction should clearly VB the original error , as well as the correct NN . The JJ step toward transparency is to listen to readers about what they do n’t VB — and what they VBP to VB — about how NN is gathered , verified , and reported The JJ question RB now is whether such transparency will lead to an increase in trust . Research by Michael Koliska , a Georgetown NNP communications professor , suggests that there are no easy solutions when it comes to creating more trust . For his Ph.D. dissertation , published in 2015 , Koliska set up several experiments in which he gave six versions of an article with varying degrees of NN , from CD that did n’t RB have a byline to CD with a byline , author bio , and NN about the sources and production process . The additional NN , however , had no effect on whether readers VBD the story more trustworthy . In fact , VBZ Koliska , readers barely seemed to register it . When he included a picture of the journalist on the page , and then showed a lineup of pictures afterwards , participants only picked out the JJ NN about a third of the NN . “ There are a lot of these kinds of things that NNS just did n’t care about , ” he VBZ . “ The transparency NN was too peripheral to the story . ” In another paper published in CD in the Journal of NNP Ethics , Koliska and his colleague Kalyani Chadha argue that rather than “ digitally outsourcing ” transparency NN by adding transparency features to web pages or publishing separate stories about the process behind the article , journalists should work the NN into the story , giving more background on the process and extent of the reporting and sources consulted as part of the story itself rather than relying on hyperlinks or author bios . That does n’t mean that providing transparency indicators is n’t worthwhile , VBZ Koliska . As awareness of “ JJ NN ” and disinformation grows , it MD VB NNS to seek out more NN about transparency . “ They will realize that they are not getting the high - quality product they VBP — they are getting McDonald ’s sold as a Whole Foods meal , and crave something better , ” he VBZ . Research by the Trust Project shows that MD already be happening . Working with the Center for NNP Engagement at the NNP of Texas at Austin , the Trust Project funded a NN in which some 1,200 participants read JJ articles on JJ topics ; some included the trust indicators , such as author bios , links , a “ Behind the Story ” companion article , and an indicator of whether the publication belonged to the Trust Project . A JJ majority felt that such indicators MD increase their trust of the publication , with the most ( 63 percent ) citing the Trust Project logo , followed by a “ Behind the Story ” section ( 59 percent ) and a list of corrections and ethics policies ( 53 percent ) . In addition , by a JJ but statistically significant margin , readers were more likely to use adjectives IN “ reputable , ” “ reliable , ” and “ can be trusted ” for articles with indicators . “ As newsrooms grapple with ways to win over doubting audiences , we find the NN results encouraging , ” the authors of the NN noted . “ The results … demonstrate that Trust Indicators can affect what NNS VBP about the NN . ” As much as the JJ environment has eroded trust and created the NN for more transparency , it RB offers unique tools to increase transparency . As Frontline ’s Putin documentary shows , nowhere is that the NN more than in allowing journalists to “ show their work ” by providing access to the original source material so readers can make up their own minds about how it was VBN . The Trust Project has advocated for a separate “ citations and references ” box that lists the key sources an article relies on ; some partners such as Mic and The Economist are already VBG those boxes . When the project did a focus group to gauge their effectiveness , they VBD they increased perceptions of credibility RB if readers did n’t click through to the underlying sources . Just letting the reader VB that a journalist conducted additional research , RB if it was n’t included in the piece can increase reader confidence . “ What if at the end of the story you listed the number of sources you reached out to , RB though 20 of them were on background , ” Stearns proposes . Some publications are taking sourcing to the next level by including not only interviews , but underlying documents and source material to bolster claims in a story . ProPublica has RB been a leader in this endeavor , VBG Document Cloud to upload and annotate documents for readers to peruse . “ It has always been core to how we do our journalism , ” VBZ editor in chief Steve Engelberg . “ In an era of complaints about JJ NN the best answer we can have in the fact - VBN universe is to provide the reader with as much fact as possible . ” For a story about death and complication rates by surgeons in 2015 , ProPublica included a Surgeon Scorecard with a searchable database readers MD use to look up specific doctors . The site RB included a detailed discussion of its methodology for calculating rates , quotes from experts backing up their methods , and an editor ’s note from Engelberg describing the reasoning behind the story . At the end of the note , Engelberg invited criticism from readers with a dedicated email address to receive them . While the site has pushed back against some of the criticism , it has taken some of it to heart , such as the fact that it only takes into account inpatient procedures , and will be VBG it to adjust their methodology for a planned Surgeon Scorecard 2.0 . ProPublica has made a habit of responding publicly to its critics , RB when they publish their critiques elsewhere — acknowledging it when they feel the critics have a point , and pushing back when they feel IN they do n’t . “ At the end of the day , we live in a universe where NNS are VBG to VB things about your work , and there is no waving it off , IN we have the printing press and you don’t , ” Engelberg VBZ . In some NNS , ProPublica has seen unintended consequences from its transparency — as was the NN when it published a database of rates of prescriptions by doctors to draw attention to an epidemic of overprescribing opioids and other potentially dangerous narcotics . Analyzing web traffic , ProPublica ’s editors noticed an uptick in traffic to the database , after Google searches such as “ doctors who prescribe narcotics easily , ” implying that readers were VBG the database to find doctors to prescribe them drugs . Rather than pulling the database , ProPublica made the fact a further exercise in transparency , running an editor ’s note explaining the problem , and adding a JJ disclaimer to the database warning about the dangers of addictive drugs . “ This is an ethically tricky area , ” VBZ Engelberg . “ We weighed the possibility that we were VBG to make it worse , but if you are in a glass NN cajoling institutions to be transparent , then to VB something about our work and not make it JJ seemed against the principles of what we do . ” In deciding whether and how to release controversial documents , the more publications can let the reader into their decision - making process , the better they might be received by audiences . In January 2017 , for example , when BuzzFeed released the Steele dossier containing allegations that the NNP administration colluded with the Russians , for example , it provided little explanation of the pros and cons of making the unverified document JJ — saying only that it wanted to let “ Americans make up their own minds about the allegations . ” The JJ question RB now is whether such transparency will lead to an increase in trust Arguably , the publication MD have taken readers behind the scenes to provide more detail about how they made this tricky journalistic decision , and how it aligned with their ethical and procedural policies , VBZ Elizabeth . Such a thoughtful explanation MD have mitigated some of the questioning and backlash it received from politicians and other NN outlets about the choice . “ I do VB BuzzFeed editors MD have offered readers a little more gut - level transparency about their decision to release the dossier , ” Elizabeth VBZ . “ But every CD of these situations is an opportunity for all of us to figure out how to do it better next NN . ” In addition to opening up their sources to scrutiny , some publications and journalists have taken the NN inside the reporting process itself — as The NNP Post ’s David Fahrenthold has done while reporting on Donald NNP ’s supposed donations to charity . From the start of his reporting , Fahrenthold posted his progress on NNP , showing his followers photos of his notebook with charities he was exploring , and RB trading barbs with NNP himself . The openness paid off with members of the NN , and RB other journalists tweeting him tips — including CD Univision journalist alerting him to the location of a portrait of himself NNP had bought with charity NN , hanging on the wall at a Florida golf club . When the nonprofit Project Veritas set up a sting operation to trick the Post ’s reporters with a JJ claim of having been impregnated by U.S. Senate candidate Roy Moore , the Post produced a story and CD - minute NN about how it uncovered the sting , and RB set up a sting of its own , showing the woman in an interview with a Post reporter , and explaining why it broke the agreement of confidentiality , since she had misrepresented herself in an attempt to embarrass the paper . The Post further elaborated on how it broke the story about Roy Moore ’s legitimate accusers in a NN produced by reporter Libby Casey , part of a JJ series called “ How to Be a Journalist , ” which seeks to take readers inside the goings - on of the newsroom . “ I was getting so JJ questions from friends and other NNS who are n’t in NN about how we do what we do , ” she VBZ . “ It showed me that with a little transparency we MD turn our storytelling RB to show how we do our work . ” Casey interviews her colleagues in an irreverent , almost jaunty style in an effort to present them in an authentic , JJ light . In interviewing reporter Stephanie McCrummen about the Roy Moore story , for example , she discusses the anxiety reporters feel knocking on doors with a notepad ready . Another NN features database editor Steven Rich , who describes how he submitted 1,500 FOIA requests last NN — detailing how readers can submit their own open records request to the NN . “ If we can demystify the process , it does empower NNS to learn what their own role can be in a democracy . ” The Toronto Star has quickly become a model of transparency with its efforts to open up the newsroom to reader scrutiny . Last NN , the paper ’s managing editor Irene Gentle started seeing an uptick in complaints and harassment against the paper that corresponded to the skepticism south of the border against JJ NN . “ She became frustrated by the fact that we VBP there is a lot of hard work behind our journalism that is being done by solid ethical principles , ” VBZ JJ editor Kathy English , “ but readers were n’t getting that . ” Starting in NNP last NN , the paper launched its own Trust Project , hiring a transparency reporter , Kenyon Wallace , whose beat is the newsroom ; each week he picks a topic and interviews reporters about how they cover it . So far topics have included how the paper covers politics , how the NN reporter vets scientific claims , and how the NN critic reviews JJ eateries . Back in January , Star reporters and editors participated in an Ask Me Anything ( AMA ) on Reddit , in which readers queried them on issues ranging from the paper ’s corrections policies to how it covers outrageous candidates IN Toronto ’s late mayor Rob Ford . That effort was driven by the younger journalists , VBZ English , despite qualms by her and other veteran colleagues . “ I did n’t VB what to expect and whether there might be some ugly trolling — and there was a little bit , ” she VBZ . To keep the conversation civil , however , the paper had an experienced moderator approve comments and make sure questions did n’t VB out of hand . The Star ’s transparency efforts MD be working ; according to the Edelman Trust Barometer , trust of journalism rose CD points in Canada over the past NN , to 61 percent . While she VBZ the Star ca n’t take complete credit for it , as CD of the country ’s biggest newspapers , it MD have had something to do with it . More outlets are experimenting with JJ NN as a NN to create communities for subscribers to interact directly with reporters and staff . The Dallas Morning NNP created a special NNP group in September for subscribers only , where they can ask reporters and editors about decisions the paper has made ; it ’s now up to 1,400 members . “ We wanted to VB to VB them and for them to VB to VB us as a NN to overcome some of the mistrust that sometimes exists , ” VBZ engagement editor Hannah Wise . Wise was worried initially that the group MD be CD JJ forum for complaints . But having discussions play out in NN has given the paper a NN to show it cares and correct misunderstandings . When CD reader complained about not having his paper delivered , editor in chief Mike Wilson jumped in to make sure he got a replacement . When a headline was incorrect , some subscribers complained the paper did n’t have copyeditors anymore . “ It was late at night , and I VBD , we do have copyeditors , they are still here RB now trying to do work — you are welcome to meet them , ” VBZ Wise . In other NNS , admitting mistakes has led to more open dialogue . When a reporter was covering an issue of separation of church and NN in a nearby suburb , she inadvertently VBD the word “ crusade , ” which readers pushed back on as an unfair use of a religious term . The reporter admitted that she had n’t intended to use the word in that NN , and MD be more careful in the future . “ Since then , the person who has given her the most grief has ‘ liked ’ every story she ’s written , ” Wise VBZ . In another NN , some readers were upset by a weekend guide featuring a gay couple on the cover . Wise explained to the group that the paper ’s role was to reflect the community , and not censor things some readers might not agree with . “ We let the community have the discussion , and I was heartened to VB that the majority of the group VBD , how can you VB this about NNS who love each other ? ” In addition to inviting readers virtually into the newsroom , some publications have RB gone so far as to invite them in physically as well . City Bureau , a nonprofit NN organization in Chicago , hosts a “ JJ newsroom ” every Thursday night , in which reporters offer talks and workshops on their investigative reporting processes and solicit JJ advice and contributions . Matt DeRienzo took that a step further as Connecticut statewide editor for Digital NNP NNP , opening up a “ newsroom café ” to the NN that was part coffee shop , part community center , and part library where NNS MD peruse the publication ’s archives . “ The Little NNP and the Garden Club MD meet RB inside our newsroom , ” DeRienzo VBZ . Over NN , having community members in the newsroom resulted in giving journalists more sources and perspectives they MD work into stories , adding more nuance and complexity . As much as the JJ environment has eroded trust and created the NN for more transparency , it RB offers unique tools to increase transparency At the same NN the publication was physically inviting NNS into the newsroom , it was RB aggressively soliciting feedback on the web through its corrections policy . Rather than just posting corrections when errors were made , the site included a box prominently placed on every story that asked the community to fact - check articles , and contact the reporter through a form if anything was incorrect . In addition to correcting errors , readers often wrote in with missing NN and additional perspective that reporters sometimes worked into other stories . “ NNS do n’t assume you are open to that unless you tell them , ” VBZ DeRienzo , who is now executive director of Local Independent NNP NNP ( LION ) Publishers . “ It led to a lot more context and accuracy . ” For publications considering increasing transparency , the decision takes forethought and planning . “ It ’s a lot of work and very resource - intensive , ” VBZ Wikimedia ’s Kramer . She recommends publications VB RB about their reasons for wanting to be more transparent , whether it ’s to acquire deeper sources , improve trust with readers , or create more engagement about local issues , and then choose the elements of transparency likely to further those goals . However it ’s implemented , she VBZ , the push has to come from the top , and be tied to clear performance goals for employees so they have an incentive to spend the extra effort . “ It has to be something management supports and creates a structure for , ” she VBZ . For journalists VBN to keeping their decisions on what to include and not include in stories to themselves , opening up what they do to such scrutiny can be disconcerting to VB the least . “ It makes journalists uncomfortable sometimes , because they feel IN it is making them a part of the story rather than being able to hide what we do , ” VBZ the Democracy Fund ’s Stearns . Journalists spend a lot of NN and care crafting their stories to give them the proper balance and serve an interpreting function for the audiences — exposing processes and source material can be nerve - racking . “ Those fears are absolutely legitimate , ” VBZ Stearns . “ It ’s a scary thing , and I totally honor and respect that . The question for me is not should we do it or should n’t we , but when should we do it ? ” Just because a publication embraces transparency does n’t mean that reporters have to post interviews and notes for every story . Publications should be strategic , VB advocates , choosing stories to start that might be important or controversial , such as investigative stories or enterprise journalism exposing an issue of pressing local concern . “ It MD feel risky , ” VBZ Stearns , “ but it will RB make you unimpeachable . ” The NN that “ Putin ’s Revenge ” was broadcast was incorrect in an earlier version of the caption . The correct NN is 2017 , not 2012 . An earlier version of this article erroneously VBD that Kalyani Chadha helped with the experiments that Michael Koliska set up for his Ph.D. dissertation .

text: NNP - elect Donald NNP gave a direct order to dismiss the son of Retired General Michael Flynn from the transition team , after the young NN came under fire for spreading the discredited ' Pizzagate ' NN NN on NNP . Sources VBD CNN's Jake Tapper that it was NNP who did the deed , after aides in the transition had reportedly requested a security clearance for Michael Flynn Jr . This afternoon , Vice NNP - elect Mike Pence revised remarks he had made earlier in the day , admitting that Flynn 's son was involved in transition effort and vaguely confirming that a security clearance MD have gone Flynn 's NN . ' I VBD this morning that his son had no involvement in the transition , ' Pence VBD Tapper . ' I talked to Gen . Flynn and his son was helping him a bit with scheduling and administrative items , but that 's no longer the NN . ' The elder Flynn is slated to become NNP - elect Donald NNP 's national security advisor in the White NNP . The younger Flynn , Mike Flynn Jr. , did not endorse the NN NN , but predicted that it wo n't VB away . ' Until # Pizzagate proven to be JJ , it 'll remain a story . The left seems to forget # PodestaEmails and the JJ " coincidences " tied to it , ' he tweeted on Sunday . He mentions the presidential transition 's website on his NNP biography . CNN reported that his current email address is linked with the transition . Tapper repeatedly asked Pence about the request for a security clearance , pointing out that , as the head of the transition , he MD be privy to such NN . Finally , his last effort paid off with Pence answering : ' Well , what I can tell you in talking to Gen . Flynn today , he made me aware that his son was assisting him in scheduling meetings . ' ' And whatever the appropriate paperwork was to assist in that regards Jake , I 'm sure it was taking place , ' Pence answered . text: Consider him the elephant not in the room , simultaneously absent from this picture and looming over it . Donald NNP did not attend Saturday ’s funeral of Barbara Bush in Houston , Texas . Reporters were VBN that was because NNP generously wanted to spare the mourning Bush family the “ disruptions due to added security ” that MD have come with his presidential presence . But that same White NNP statement MD well have given the game away when it added that NNP did not attend “ out of respect for the Bush family and friends attending the service ” . Normally , the NN you pay your respects to a grieving family is to show up , not stay away . Unless , of course , you VBP that the bereaved family in question hates your guts – in which NN the greatest courtesy you can pay them in their hour of distress is to leave them alone . Which might explain the unstated emotion that seems to join everyone in this picture . It ’s an unusual group photo : they ’re not family , they ’re not friends , and they ’re not a team . Rather , the official connection between them is that they have all lived in the country ’s most important residence , whether as NN or JJ lady – or in Hillary NNP ’s NN , having attempted the double . They are there to honour the missing member of this exclusive club , the woman whose death has brought them to this moment . ( The only living members missing are Jimmy and Rosalynn Carter , who were travelling . ) The warmth between them – Republican George W Bush with arms IN both his wife and Democrat Hillary – is the camaraderie you often VBP between CD - NN partisan rivals now bonded by having shared a rare and extraordinary experience . ( You VBP something similar in those pictures of duelling heavyweight boxers reunited in retirement . ) But there ’s something else too . The picture is not sombre , RB though this is a funeral . Obama and NNP NNP are smiling broadly ; W has that lopsided grin that suggests he ’s cracked CD of his fratboy jokes . They seem relaxed . And the source of that relaxation ? MD it possibly be their collective relief that NNP is not there ? That , surely , is the CD thing this group can agree on . Bush Sr revealed last NN that he voted for Hillary in CD rather than back the official Republican nominee whom he ’d dismissed as a “ blowhard ” . Bush Jr VBD he left his ballot blank . Neither of them ever endorsed NNP , who had mocked son / brother Jeb Bush as “ low NN ” and whom Barbara herself had condemned as a “ comedian ” , a “ showman ” and an appalling sexist . Bushes , Clintons , Obamas : all have their own reasons to despise the Donald . He denied Hillary her dream ; he claimed Barack Obama was not born in the US ; he is the very opposite of a Bush Republican . Which leaves Melania . Should n’t she be uncomfortable among all these NNS who despise her husband ? What explains her apparent ease , smiling as readily as the rest of them ? The clue might be in some of the other pictures taken at Saturday ’s service . There she was , seated next to Barack Obama , looking positively cheery . “ Have you ever , ever , EVER seen Melania smile IN this , and look this relaxed , beside her own husband ? Ever ? , ” tweeted the NN writer Steve Silberman . Others noted the oddity that here was the JJ lady looking happier than she had in ages – at a funeral . There is indeed no shortage of pictures of Melania looking miserable or ignored by NNP , as he walks up or down the stairs of Air Force CD without her , not showing his wife RB the most basic courtesy , let alone marital affection . Compared to the hostile environment that is a NNP marriage , a moment with the real - NN presidents ’ club must have felt IN blissful respite .

text: Before Keane - Vieira and Pizzagate came the Battle of Old Trafford — a 21 - NN brawl , sparked by Brian McClair kicking Nigel Winterburn on the floor , which saw NNP and Manchester NNP docked points and started three decades of hostility . Those involved in the October 1990 episode were indeed from a JJ era , from alpha - male managers Sir Alex NNP and George Graham to on - pitch warriors IN Tony Adams , Mark Hughes and Steve Bruce . How supporters MD love the current NNP and NNP teams to have some of that , instead of watching a couple of underachieving Europa NNP sides face each other on a Monday night . ‘ I ’d been fascinated by Alex coming down to England . I knew about his success at Aberdeen and was desperate to VB off this JJ challenger , ’ VBZ Graham , reflecting on the start of the rivalry . ‘ As Scots , we were very welcoming to each other in personal terms , but extremely passionate about doing the best for our clubs . I remember Alex being so keen to rebuild NNP he tried to VB all the best kids from the south . ‘ This particular game , the stakes were high because we were unbeaten and pumped up . We did win 1 - 0 , but the flare - up turned it into a nightmare and we were deducted CD points . Luckily , we were good enough to win the NNP anyway !’ NNP was so impressed by the instinct of NNP ’s players to wade in and VB their mates , it became a blueprint for his future success . The glory days have gone for both teams following the departures of NNP and Arsene NNP . Graham , who played for NNP as well as winning the NNP and cup Double for NNP , ca n’t offer much immediate comfort . ‘ I ca n’t VB either challenging at the top for three seasons at least , ’ he VBD . ‘ RB the top four will be tough for them RB now . When standards slip , it ’s hard to raise them again , and Liverpool and Manchester City are n’t VBG anywhere . ‘ NNS talk about a lack of leaders and they have a point , particularly at centre - half . VB about Tony Adams , John Terry , Vincent Kompany , Virgil van Dijk . Every NNP supporter wants a defender IN that . NNP have been looking for NNS . They ’ve signed Harry Maguire and hope he ’s the answer . But that ’s the word : “ hoping ” . ‘ NNP are under greater pressure because expectations there are higher , both for results and the style of play . text: Now that NNP - elect Donald J. NNP has started firing NNS for spreading JJ NN , let ’s hope he does n’t stop at CD . On Tuesday , he canned transition team member Michael G. Flynn for taking to NNP to keep alive the JJ “ Pizzagate ” NN NN — involving a believable combination of NN sex slaves , a pizzeria and Hillary NNP — RB after it led to a vigilante shooting last weekend inside a NNP D.C. NN . ( “ The intel on this was n’t 100 percent , ” the gunman VBD the NNP NNP Times on Wednesday . Ya VB ? ) Next up should be Vice NNP - elect Mike Pence for claiming Mr. Flynn was n’t part of the NNP transition team , followed by Mr. Flynn ’s father , Lt. Gen. Michael T. Flynn . The elder Flynn is Mr. NNP ’s pick for national security adviser , and he ’s as bad as his son when it comes to misusing JJ NN — endorsing alt - JJ figures and disparaging Muslims on NNP and passing along bogus claims about , among other things , Hillary NNP being headed to jail and plans for a CD NN church banning Christianity . And then , of course , Mr. NNP will have to let himself VB . A sample of his misinformation , according to Politifact : • Millions of NNS voted illegally in the presidential NN . ( No they did n’t . ) • African - JJ communities are in the “ worst shape they ’ve ever been in . ” ( CD word : slavery . ) • There are no chess grandmasters in the U.S. ( We have 90 . ) • He “ finished ” the Obama birther controversy . ( Try “ furthered it . ” ) • “ Inner - city crime is reaching record levels . ” ( Violent crime in cities has been cut in half since the mid-1990s . ) • “ We do n’t VB anything about Hillary in terms of religion . ” ( She ’s a JJ - practicing Methodist . ) • Ted Cruz ’s father “ was with Lee Harvey Oswald ” before the assassination of NNP JFK . ( This is VBN on a National Enquirer story ; VB I VB more ? ) The irony here , of course , is that while it ’s never been easier to disseminate wild claims — JJ NN NN stories were actually shared far more than real NN stories on NNP in the three months prior to NN Day — it ’s RB never been easier to debunk them . If employing common sense and critical thinking skills are n’t enough , there are dozens of websites devoted to fact - checking the latest viral rumors . ( Here are some about Mr. Obama we ’d VB to put to bed : He ’s not buying a vacation NN in Dubai ; he has n’t signed an executive order banning the Pledge of Allegiance in JJ schools ; and he did not , unfortunately , ban JJ NN sites post- NN ) But Mr. NNP apparently has n’t learned the finer details of VBG Google to check his “ facts . ” And then there are the statements he makes that we ca n’t yet classify as real or JJ . Does he RB VB to cancel the Boeing contract for a JJ Air Force CD , or is tweeting so just a strategy to VB a discount on the NN ? Are flag burners truly in jeopardy of losing their citizenship or spending a NN in jail despite JJ Amendment protections , as he VBD they should be ? And is he indeed planning to “ terminate ” the Cuba deal Mr. Obama cut if it ’s not improved in our favor ? He appears to float random ideas to gauge JJ reaction , IN throwing spaghetti at a wall to VB if it sticks . “ I am seriously considering Dr. Ben Carson as the head of HUD . I ’ve gotten to VB him well — he ’s a greatly talented person who loves NNS ! ” he tweeted on Nov. 22 . Nearly CD weeks later , after relatively little backlash ( likely owing to the Thanksgiving holiday ) , he made it official . He raised the idea of Mitt Romney as secretary of NN weeks ago but has delayed making a decision as his allies trash the JJ Massachusetts governor , who famously railed against Mr. NNP during the campaign . Then again , the NN - elect might just be messing with Mr. Romney and others he views as antagonistic . Why else MD he meet with NNP Gore — who co-won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2007 for efforts “ to build up and disseminate greater NN about man-made NN NN ” — only turn RB a few days later and appoint a NN NN denier to head the NNP Protection Agency ? Maybe that ’s what he was RB up to with the Boeing tweet , which caused the NN ’s NN to plummet . After all , it appeared shortly after Boeing ’s CEO criticized Mr. NNP ’s trade policies in The NNP ’s sister paper , the Chicago Tribune . The only thing we can be sure of when it comes to Mr. NNP is that whatever he ’s saying , JJ or JJ , has been crafted for CD purpose : serving his personal interests , whatever they MD be . So can we VB him when he VBZ he ’ll “ make NNP great again ” ? I do n’t VB we VBP to VB to Snopes.com to figure out the answer to that . Tricia Bishop is The NNP ’s deputy editorial page editor . text: Fighting JJ NN is the JJ pretext given by the ruling cabal in JJ nations to enact censorship via the back door . Amid the rallying cries of “ We must fight JJ NN ! ” both France ( under MD - be dictator Macron ) and now Brazil are attempting to pass legislation to ban JJ NN on the web that the NN deems to be JJ NN . There is a theme to this , as it follows on from JJ acts of censorship in CD and 2017 . Whether it ’s NNP shadowbanning , NNP rolling our JJ NN checkers or deleting entire accounts , NNP embarking upon soft censorship through forced sign - ins or hard censorship by deleting entire channels , Google ’s search engine hiding websites ( by de-ranking them ) or – worst of all – Google demonetizing NN and sites not to its liking , censorship is clearly getting worse and threatening to overtake a free and open internet . All in the Name of Fighting JJ NN The JJ corporations of the internet have shown their JJ colors on the issue of censorship vs. free speech . Amazon has been caught banning certain books from being sold on its platform , e.g. in 2015 it decided to ban Jim Fetzer ’s book No CD Died at Sandy Hook , which exposed the JJ flag mass shooting at Sandy Hook . In reaction to the whole “ Russian meddling in the US NN saga ” , which is itself JJ NN and a tempest in a teapot , NNP decided to VB tough and enlist the NN of international fact checkers to do your thinking for you and decide for you what is real NN and what is JJ NN . Funnily enough , it was recently reported that the rollout did n’t VB so well , so for the NN being NNP has canned the idea because it was making things worse ! NNP has RB been caught banning posts on certain topics ( e.g. with NaturalNews.com and their posts on gun NN ) or RB deleting entire accounts of NNS it did n’t VB ( as recently happened with David Icke , whose 700,000 + follower account just got reinstated after being down for 6 days due to an “ error ” – yeah RB ) . Related : Father of ‘ NNP NNP ’ PsyOp is the ex-boyfriend of James “ NNP ” Alefantis . Now he ’s Working With Google and NNP to Shut Down Alternative NN & Free Speech — Leaked Docs If fighting JJ NN is so important , why not ban the MSM ? That should take care of most of it . Examples of actual JJ NN from the mainstream NN , which sometimes had absolutely horrific consequences ( NN , destruction , sufferance and loss of JJ NN ) : 1. MSM censored / ignored a shocking admission of highest level Turkish JJ flag against Syria , which MD have triggered a NN between the CD nations LS . BBC Journalist Comes Clean : ‘ VB Nothing You Read Or Watch ’ NNP is no stranger to censorship either , with its employees boasting of shadow banning ( aka stealth banning , ghost banning or comment ghosting ) , meaning blocking a user or their NN from an JJ community without the user realizing they have been banned . At CD point Google publicly floated the idea of deranking and delisting certain sites ( they mentioned Russian sites RT and Sputnik ) , but they later did a U - Turn and claimed they MD not be doing that . Obviously , it is easily within their NN to tamper with algorithms to include or exclude anything they VBP , and virtually no NN MD ever VB the search results were being skewed due to Google ’s own ideological bias . Google was caught doing this in favor of Hillary NNP during the CD US presidential elections . Indeed , after the firing of ex-Google employee James Damore ( who has now initiated a class NN lawsuit due to his dismissal ) , we have to wonder whether bias is n’t already coded into Google ’s algorithms just as a result of their orthodoxy and culture ( left - wing and promoting diversity at all costs ) . Recently , Breitbart reported that Google ’s fact - checking almost exclusively targets conservative or JJ wing NN . It ’s not just Google itself . Google - owned NNP has been embarking on campaigns of both soft censorship and hard censorship . In JJ ways , soft censorship is more insidious , because then the NN can claim plausible deniability and refuse to admit they are RB engaged in censorship . In this NN , soft censorship refers to when NNP technically allows NNS to watch a NN , but makes it difficult by putting barriers in the NN , e.g. by claiming the NN is “ age - restricted ” ( forcing you to open an account , give your details to NNP and prove that you are of mature age ) or VBG other ways to force you to sign in before being allowed to watch the NN . The adpocalypse of 2017 as it was called was perhaps closer to hard censorship , and involved a sweeping demonetization of videos due to “ inappropriate NN ” for advertisers . Finally , YT has actually deleted entire channels on occasion , such as the deletion of ActivistPost ’s account last NN in 2017 . Fighting JJ NN is RB about the end goal of narrowing the “ allowable ” , “ permissable ” or RB “ legal ” range of thought … censorship and perception management . It ’s Not Just Fighting JJ NN ; Censorship RB Thriving under Pretext of Fighting Terrorism , Fighting Hate Speech and Being JJ Correct Fighting JJ NN gives MD - be tyrants a great excuse to censor , however free speech is RB being eroded by the equally vague and nebulous concepts of terrorism and hate speech . The term JJ NN rose to prominence RB IN the NN that Donal NNP was elected in November CD , yet there is hardly a clear and widely - agreed upon definition for the phrase . It often gets VBN by NNS who seek to criticize NN they do n’t VB , dismiss allegations against them , or RB to defend themselves when faced with an unflattering report about themselves . As Glenn Greenwald writes : “ Yet , as JJ have RB been warning , few NNS , if any , ever bothered to define what the term [ JJ NN ] actually means . As a result , it ’s incredibly vague , shifting , and devoid of consistent meaning . Do any NN articles that contain JJ , significant assertions qualify ? Is there some intent requirement , and if so , what is it and how is determined ( does recklessness qualify ) ? “ Can JJ mainstream outlets such as the NNP Post , Le Monde , and Globo be guilty of publishing “ JJ NN ” and thus subject to this censorship , or is it — as PRP expects — reserved only for JJ , independent blogs and outlets that lack a powerful corporate presence ? “ Ill - defined terms that become popularized in JJ discourse are , by definition , terms of propaganda rather than reliable , meaningful indicators of problems .
