text: KrainaGrzybowTV ( English translation : Mushroomland ) is a bizarre NNP channel that has become a viral sensation in its native Poland and across the NN . This is the disturbing story behind it . I remember when I RB randomly came across an episode of KrainaGrzybowTV . After about 45 seconds into it , I yelled out “ NOPE ” , closed my browser , and almost threw my computer out of the window . A few months later , a VC reader sent me a summary of the series and its disturbing symbolism . So I sat down and watch the entire thing . The experience left me feeling nauseated and thoroughly creeped out . Each episode of Mushroomland is styled to look IN an 80’s NNS ’s TV show from Eastern Europe . The host of the show is Agatha , a young girl that has paper eyes over her actual eyes . Each episode begins with an “ educational ” theme ( i.e. “ How to Apple ” ) , which then turns into a bizarre , confusing , and terrifying ordeal . Throughout the episodes , we learn that Agatha has actually been abducted by strange men and sent to a mysterious place called Mushroomland . Rainbowland episodes were published on NNP between 2013 and 2017 , with each episode describing a JJ aspect of Agatha ’s ordeal . The channel quickly became a viral sensation and garnered over 3 CD views , a cult following … and some controversy . Various NNS have attempted to decode the meaning behind these bizarre videos . In some episodes , NNS saw references to an atomic NN . Other NNS claim that Rainbowland is about Agatha taking hallucinogenic drugs ( i.e. mushrooms ) or being possessed by a demon . Others VBP that the entire thing has no meaning , that it is pure nonsense and that it is just a viral marketing campaign to sell NNS ( the soundtrack and related merchandise ) . While all of these NNS are probably partially JJ , there is much more VBG on in Rainbowland videos . Each episode is packed with seemingly random images that actually make sense when PRP understands their underlying concept : Trauma - VBN NN NN . RB VBN as Monarch Programming , the aim of trauma - VBN NN NN is to expose victims to trauma so intense ( through abuse , drugs , torture , etc. ) that it causes them to dissociate from reality . While in this vulnerable NN , handlers program JJ alter personas into the minds of their victims that can be triggered at will ( for more NN on Monarch Programming , read the full article here ) . This is exactly what happens to Agatha in Rainbowland . In the JJ episode , we are introduced to the TV show “ Smile Guide ” , hosted by Agatha . The fact that Agatha has her eyes covered by JJ eyes is the JJ of JJ symbols directly alluding to MK programming . Indeed , as seen in previous articles on this site , this symbol represents the fact that NN - controlled slaves are blinded to reality . It is their handlers that dictate what the slaves perceive to be “ reality ” . Then , we are introduced to Maggie – a cartoon squirrel who acts as a co-host . Although the squirrel seems to be “ friendly ” , a quick shot reveals its JJ nature . Demonology is an intricate part of Monarch programming . Handlers often assign “ demons ” to their slaves in order to further their trauma and reinforce programming . In later episodes , we actually VBP how Maggie is an agent of trauma . In the JJ episode , Agatha shows kids “ How to Apple ” . The name of each episode is phrased in an odd matter as a key word is often omitted . This reflects the confusing , nonsensical environment in which MK slaves are forced to live in . Meanwhile , various symbolic images flash onscreen , including this NN . As we VBP Agatha feverishly VBG back and forth inside the apple with a knife , we understand that she is actually “ reenacting ” her own sexual abuse . This JJ episode RB introduces Agatha ’s mother . Throughout the episodes , her mother tells her story under the cover of anonymity . Everything she VBZ points directly to NN NN . In the JJ episode , the mother VBZ that a NN came to her NN at midnight to take her daughter to Mushroomland , adding that “ it is easy to find Mushroomland , but it ’s the return that might prove a bit more difficult ” . Episode 2 : How To Make From Paper The episode begins with Agatha “ glitching ” and stuttering when trying to VB ” papieru ” ( Polish for paper ) . The glitch might be a result of the trauma she suffered in the JJ episode . Throughout the series , we VBP a red , evil looking Agatha at random moments . MK slaves are often programmed VBG dualistic good / evil patterns . Later , Agatha loses patience and tells Maggie the squirrel to “ VB lost , r----d ” . This was not a good idea . The “ demonic ” side of Maggie surfaces and does not shy away from punishing Agatha . Maggie then “ makes thing better ” in the creepiest NN possible . The rest of the episode is a bizarre , confusing ordeal which appears to compare Agatha ’s mother to a cow . Is she being programmed to hate her mother ? The 4th episode ( there is no 3rd episode ) focuses on hair … in the creepiest NN possible . If you ’ve read previous articles on this site , you VBP that MK slaves often develop a bizarre , unhealthy obsession with their hair . It is not rare that , during breakdowns , they shave off their hair . The most glaring NN is the 2007 Britney Spears meltdown . The episode “ How to Hair ” appears to detail the psychopathic process that causes MK slaves to obsess over their hair and to develop an urge to VB rid of it . Then , all kinds of crazy stuff happens . Meanwhile , Agatha is still hosting a kid ’s show . In a segment dedicated to reading viewer mail , Agatha receives various absurd and disturbing letters . Then Agatha ’s handler makes his JJ appearance : Jeans NNP . Then , in a hypnotic scene , the programming takes place . This episode appears to provide “ insider ” insight into how MK slaves are programmed , through psychological brainwashing and physical trauma , to hate their own hair . IN Britney Spears during her meltdown . Later in the episode , Agatha ’s mother VBZ that neither the NNS , the principal , or the priest MD VB her find her daughter . She RB receives bizarre calls from her daughter . This episode begins with Agatha passed out . A ghostly and hairless thing emerges from her and starts talking . Agatha then wakes up and teaches kids “ how to properly telephone ” . However , when the phone rings , things VBP very MK ULTRA . Throughout this episode , various puzzle pieces flash on screen . Once pieced together , the puzzle reveals a bizarre picture of an unknown place . What is that about ? After the electroshock , Agatha falls down under the table and a JJ Agatha , who has a radically JJ personality , sits at her place . This appears to be a reference to Beta Kitten programming – a sex slave alter . Then , Maggie the demon squirrel takes Agatha to the NN who VBZ this : To deflower means “ To deprive a woman of her virginity ” . Therefore , the scene alludes to Agatha being deflowered by her handler . For this reason , Agatha replies : Then things VBP RB worse . Maggie tells Agatha : The rest of the episode is a chaotic and confusing mishmash of sounds and images , where Agatha is often seen screaming in NN and walking RB in a computer - generated virtual NN – a reference to dissociation . In the final episode , Agatha VBZ that she has a NN , but she ’s holding a doll . Was Agatha actually pregnant from the abuse ? Does Agatha VB that the doll is an actual NN ? From what when can piece together from previous episodes , Justine is a slave who did not “ behave ” and now she ’s dead . A programming project that went wrong ? Then the demon squirrel slaps Agatha in the face . After a hypnotic scene , influenced by Japanese cartoon TV shows from the 80s , Maggie announces to Agatha that she has VBN a “ real Mushroomlight ” and that she can now open her eyes . Will she finally be free ? We then VBP Agatha ( with her paper eyes back on ) and Maggie sitting outside and joking . This final scene VBZ it all . Everything that happened in the previous episodes was happening in her head … while she was in the cell . Because she ’s an MK slave . This additional episode features Agatha reading a disturbing letter she wrote to her mother . Agatha ’s mother VBZ that she received this final letter from Mushroomland . A final , cruel taunt from extremely evil NNS . What the Hell Did I Just Watch ? The least PRP can VB is that the creator behind Mushroomland , Wiktor Stribog , has some intimate NN about trauma - VBN NN NN . Other videos on his channel allude to the same concept . The NN PIWNICA / CELLAR is a horrifying tale of a NN traumatized by his father , combined with extremely symbolic paintings referring to NN NN , satanism , and NN abuse . Mushroomland appears to have spawned other Polish NNP channels with equally bizarre NN . CD of the most NN - boggling ones is Magiczny Świat Ani / The Magic NNP of Ania . Although the channel is still active , the episodes that have been published tell the story of the mysterious abduction of a young girl named Ania . Each episode is replete with MK symbolism and allusions to Satanic Ritual Abuse – combined with all sorts of codes , ciphers and hidden links to various JJ NN accounts . While the channel appears to feature some ARG elements ( Alternate Reality Game ) , some VBP that it actually refers to real NN abductions and murders . Mushroomland cannot be fully explained without considering trauma - VBN NN NN and CD its key components : satanic ritual abuse . Dozens of other screenshots MD have been added to explain how deeply this NNP channel goes into this disturbing topic . Mushroomland is part of a JJ wave of JJ entertainment that blurs the line between fiction and reality . While it addresses the topic of NN NN , the hypnotic , distorted and nauseating sounds and images VBN in each episode causes viewers to personally experience some of its horrors . The scariest thing about Mushroomland is that those who celebrate the videos as “ great art ” have no idea what they are truly about .

text: Hilary Hurd is a 2L at Harvard Law School . She previously studied international security in the UK on a Marshall Scholarship . Special thanks to Professor Jack Goldsmith and Professor Martha Minow for their helpful comments on this paper . With over 2.34 CD active NNS , [ 1 ] NNP is the NN ’s largest JJ NN platform . [ 2 ] NNS use it to share intimate NN about their lives , but RB to share " JJ NN , " either for a devious purpose or , perhaps more troublingly , because they assume the NN is JJ . The CD " Pizzagate " scandal epitomized how a JJ NNP post MD torpedo across the internet , leading a gullible person to take up arms ; [ 3 ] meanwhile , JJ books and articles evaluating NNP ’s impact on the CD NN underscore just how pervasive JJ advertisements can be . [ 4 ] This paper explores the " JJ NN " problem and the challenges it poses for society . It explains what steps NNP has taken to minimize the effects of JJ NN on its platform and the technological and philosophical challenges involved . Rather than explore policy proposals to minimize JJ NN , it is principally concerned with CD US legal doctrine which MD thwart most policy proposals outright : " NN NN " NN . It explains how NN NN NN might be revitalized and why such a revitalization MD exacerbate JJ NN . NNP insists that it ’s not a NN NN — yet a majority of subscribers use NNP for NN . [ 5 ] A CD NN by Pew Research Service VBD that 66 % of NNS use NNP for NN , compared with just 21 % of NNS on NNP and 59 % on NNP . [ 6 ] Of those who use NNP for NN , an estimated 64 % are unlikely to VB NN from another JJ NN site . [ 7 ] Having a topical NN Feed provides JJ benefits , but the consequences can be disastrous when the NN is JJ . " JJ NN " on NNP is especially pernicious . Not only is the " real identity " of any given NNP account easier to camouflage than a printed source , the prospect of making NN through JJ advertising creates a powerful financial incentive to deceive . [ 8 ] Though not all NNP NNS are inclined to VB , or share , JJ stories they VBP on the internet , stories gain credibility when shared RB by a friend . [ 9 ] " JJ NN " means JJ things to JJ NNS . Clair Wardle and Hossein Derakhshan break the term " JJ NN " into three categories : " mis-information " ( JJ NN shared without harmful intent ) ; " dis-information " ( JJ NN shared with harmful intent ) ; and lastly " mal- NN " ( genuine NN shared to VB harm ) . [ CD ] NNP seems to apply related distinctions . In NNP ’s 2018 NN , " Facing Facts , " NN NN manager , Eduardo Ariño de La Rubia , classifies JJ NN into a four - box matrix . [ 11 ] On the x-axis , NN increases by truthfulness , moving from less to more JJ . On the y - axis , the intention underlying the post moves from innocent to devious . NNP ’s JJ NN work is mostly focused on NN that is in the upper left quadrant : namely , NN that is " less JJ " but RB " devious " by intention . This is what NNP is traditionally referring to when it talks about " disinformation " or " hoaxes . " [ 12 ] Nonetheless , NNP is RB concerned with propaganda ( especially when coordinated by foreign governments ) , which falls in the upper JJ quadrant : " devious " but not necessarily untrue . [ 13 ] NNP ’s categories illustrate how intention interacts with truth , but they obfuscate the difficulty in determining " intention . " For example , satirical headlines from the Onion or The NNP Yorker ’s " Borowitz Report " often contain JJ NN with the goal of making an overarching " JJ " point , but not every reader necessarily regards those stories as satirical . In a story by Christian magazine , Babylon Bee , CNN reportedly purchased a giant washing machine in which to " spin " its stories . [ 14 ] While JJ readers might have understood the story was a satirical jab at the liberal NN , CD of the five fact - checking organizations employed by NNP , Snopes , flagged the story as " JJ . " [ 15 ] What is NNP doing about JJ NN ? The CD Presidential NN brought our attention to the digital " JJ NN " problem . CD month later , NNP revealed its plans to address the issue of " fakes and hoaxes " RB . [ 16 ] Since then , NNP has introduced JJ NNS and techniques to 1 ) identify JJ NN , mostly falling within the " hoaxes " category though sometimes extending to " propaganda ; " 2 ) remove JJ accounts ; and 3 ) tighten regulation of advertisements . [ 17 ] Because much JJ NN is a financial effort to make NN through advertising , NNP believes the solution lies in removing the underlying financial incentives . NNP ’s " Community Standards " expressly prohibit hate speech and credible incitements to violence , [ 18 ] but they do n’t expressly forbid JJ NN . [ CD ] For example , when NNP removed pages run by Alex Jones in 2018 , they cited his hateful and bullying speech , not falsehood , as the rationale . [ 20 ] Nonetheless , while NNP does not " remove " JJ NN , [ 21 ] it tries to identify it and minimize its spread . To do so , NNP combines self - reporting by NNS and third - party identification by independent fact - checkers , including Factcheck , Snopes , the Associated Press , Politifact , and the Weekly Standard . [ 22 ] Initially , NNP flagged any story identified as JJ in NNS ’ NN Feeds with a " disputed " signal and a corresponding article that explained the decision . [ 23 ] These stories subsequently appeared lower in the NNP Feed , reducing views by over 80 % . [ 24 ] No story flagged as " disputed " MD be converted into an advertisement . [ 25 ] NNP later VBD that the disputed signal actually entrenched deeply held beliefs and was thus counterproductive in discouraging certain NN consumption . [ 26 ] In 2017 , NNP replaced the disputed signal with links to " related articles " whenever a user went to share a disputed post . [ 27 ] The " related articles " contained similar , presumably more accurate , NN on the same topic . NNP nonetheless continued to demote disputed stories and prevent disputed stories from being VBN for advertisements . Publishers whose stories are flagged " JJ " can contact fact - checkers for challenge or correction . [ 28 ] While it ’s not JJ how JJ " disputed " posts external organizations identify , [ 29 ] some reports indicate that NNP does n’t provide its fact - checkers sufficient financial or strategic support . [ 30 ] NNP acknowledges some ongoing challenges associated with external partners , including 1 ) NNP currently lacks fact - checkers in some NNS ; 2 ) JJ NNS have JJ journalism standards ; and 3 ) " it can take hours or RB days to review a single claim . " [ 31 ] Nonetheless , NNP has sought to amplify fact - checkers ’ work through machine learning techniques , which can identify duplicates of previously debunked stories and to flag posts that replicate those messages across the internet . [ 32 ] While NNP ’s standards do n’t prohibit JJ NN , they do require " authenticity " --- meaning that NNS cannot misrepresent their identities RB by VBG a JJ account . [ 33 ] When NNP identifies these misleading accounts , it deletes them . For example , NNP took down a network of more than 270 pages and accounts associated with the Russian Internet Research Agency ( IRA ) because the IRA " repeatedly VBD complex networks of inauthentic accounts to deceive and manipulate NNS who use NNP , including before , during and after the CD US presidential elections . " [ 34 ] NNP acknowledged some pages did not contain JJ NN , but emphasized the pages ’ inauthentic creation . [ 35 ] Drawing upon the NNP ’s four - part framework , these " inauthentic " campaigns resemble " propaganda " more closely than " hoaxes . " In NNP 2018 , NNP released its JJ " Community Standards Enforcement Report , " which tracks NNP ’s progress in minimizing JJ accounts — along with spam , violence and graphic NN , adult nudity , hate speech , and terrorist propaganda . [ 36 ] In the report , NNP estimated that approximately 3 - 4 % of its active NNS have " JJ accounts . " [ 37 ] NNP disabled 1.3 CD of those accounts in early 2018 , reporting that it identified almost all of these JJ accounts VBG its software algorithm ( 98.5 % as of Q3 ) , while individual NNS reported the remaining JJ accounts . [ 38 ] The CD NN raised JJ questions about the ability of foreign actors to target Americans with JJ advertisements . [ 39 ] NNP estimates that CD CD Americans saw NNP - sponsored advertisements shortly before and after the CD NN . [ 40 ] These advertisements were about divisive JJ and JJ issues , costing only $ 6,700 total . [ 41 ] In April 2017 , NNP shut down a network of 47 accounts and pages believed to be operated out of NNP with the purpose of spreading JJ NN . Six months later , NNP delivered 3,000 advertisements from this network to Congress . [ 42 ] Unlike the vast majority of NNP NN , which lacks pre-publication review , NNP analyzes advertisements before publication , VBG both automated and manual review , to ensure they do n’t violate NNP ’s twenty - nine guidelines for prohibited NN . [ 43 ] These guidelines range from straight - forward rules to complex standards related to misinformation . For example , guideline thirteen NNS : " [ a ]ds , landing pages , and business practices must not contain deceptive , JJ , or misleading NN , including deceptive claims , offers , or methods . " [ 44 ] Unlike its rules for normal posts , NNP distinguishes between JJ and non-political advertisements . [ 45 ] In 2017 , NNP enhanced its authenticity requirements for anyone paying to run NN - related ads on NNP , requiring that they disclose their identities and locations . [ 46 ] In 2018 , NNP extended the disclosure requirement to anyone who wanted to show politically charged " issue ads , " [ 47 ] with a specific list of issues tailored by country . [ 48 ] NNP ’s policy allegedly applies to ads that take a position on those issues so to influence JJ debate , promote ballot measures , or elect candidates . [ 49 ] Overall , NNP ’s success is mixed . A NN by NNP NNP NNP and Stanford VBD that , after the CD NN , NNS ’ interaction with JJ NN stories declined by over 50 % on NNP , while they increased on NNP . [ 50 ] Similarly , another NN by the fact - checking arm of French newspaper , Le Monde , showed a 50 % drop in engagement with JJ NN sources in France since 2015 . [ 51 ] Nonetheless , sites repeatedly flagged by NNP as JJ still appear on the platform , [ 52 ] and NNP - user engagements with JJ NN sites still hover IN 70 CD per month . [ 53 ] An outstanding challenge for NNP is its NNP Feed algorithm , currently optimized to maximize the " engagement " of its NNS . [ 54 ] Articles not likely to " engage " a user VBN on their prior conduct ( e.g. what they have liked , shared , or posted ) are deprioritized in favor of articles that prompt a user to respond , whether because NNS approve of something and " VB " it or because they are outraged . Because JJ NN stories are frequently designed to be intentionally " outrageous , " they receive an algorithmic boost over more reliable NN . [ 55 ] The aforementioned techniques NNP uses to minimize " JJ NN " through diminishing its presence in the NNP Feed counteract that algorithmic boost but have led some to criticize NNP for explicit censorship . They are not wrong . After all , the consequence of " diminishing " posts by 80 % versus removing them is not substantial . [ 56 ] NNP is a private entity unrestrained by the Constitution . [ 57 ] So far , efforts to apply the JJ Amendment to it have failed . [ 58 ] Nonetheless , it ’s wrong to assume that constitutional restraints will never reach it . The NNP has imposed constitutional restraints on private actors in the past , and there is reason to VB it MD do so again , potentially this term in Halleck v. Manhattan Community Access . [ 59 ] Should the NN decide that regulating speech in a " JJ forum " necessarily qualifies as NN NN under the " JJ function " test , it MD pave the NN for transforming NNP into a NN actor with respect to NN pages . After all , NNP ’s current program of NN moderation — from minimizing posts , to deleting accounts , to evaluating ads — certainly qualifies as speech regulation . While free speech advocates are JJ to demand that NNP enhance transparency and accountability , treating NNP as a NN actor MD exacerbate the JJ NN problem . The NNP currently employs a CD - part framework to determine whether the Constitution applies against a private actor — often referred to as the Lugar - Edmondson framework . [ 60 ] RB , litigants must prove " the claimed deprivation resulted from the exercise of a NN or privilege having its source in NN authority . " [ 61 ] Second , litigants must show that the private parties whose actions caused the deprivation " MD be appropriately characterized as ' NN actors . ' " [ 62 ] Where deprivation is caused by a nominally private entity , the NN employs JJ tests : the " JJ function test " ( when the NN delegates a so - called " JJ function " ) is the most relevant when considering how NN NN doctrine might be expanded to include NNP . [ 63 ] At present , the JJ function test is narrowly conceived . In Jackson v.Metropolitan Edison Co. , the NNP defined a " JJ function " as the exercise " by a private entity of powers traditionally exclusively reserved to the NN . " [ 64 ] These " traditionally exclusively reserved " functions include running elections ; [ 65 ] maintaining a municipal park ; [ 66 ] and -- in the days of NN towns -- operating an entire town . [ 67 ] Despite the fact that JJ private entities engage in activities serving the NN , the NNP has avoided classifying more under the " JJ function " umbrella , for fear of impinging on private actors ’ freedom . [ 68 ] Consequently , the NNP engages in awkward analysis trying to distinguish actions that are the exclusive prerogative of governments from those that governments often perform . [ 69 ] As the doctrine stands , NNP fails the JJ function test because what NNP does -- from moderating NN to " storing , caching , or providing access to NN " -- is not a traditional function exclusively reserved to the NN . [ 70 ] Nonetheless , it ’s possible that the NN might adopt a more expansive notion of " JJ function " so as to include some NNP ’s activities : namely , its moderation of JJ NN , including JJ NN or hate speech . In October , the Supreme NNP granted certiorari in Halleck v. Manhattan Community Access , a Second Circuit NN that applied a JJ NN NN test for determining whether a JJ access television channel qualified as a NN actor for purposes of 42 U.S.C. § 1983 . [ 71 ] The Second Circuit relied on Justice Kennedy ’s concurrence in Denver Area Educational Telecommunications Consortium , Inc. v. FCC , which VBD that when JJ access channels are required by law , those channels qualify as per se " designated JJ forums . " [ 72 ] From this , the NN reasoned that , because federal law authorized setting aside channels for JJ access and a municipality contracted with a non-profit organization to then run those channels , those channels qualified as " JJ forums . " [ 73 ] To determine whether the JJ Amendment MD apply against the non-profit tasked to run those channels , the Second Circuit evaluated the connection between the municipality and the non-profit — concluding that because the NN of the municipality designated the Manhattan Neighborhood to run the channels , the non-profit had a sufficient connection to the NN to qualify as a " NN actor . " [ 74 ] In a concurring opinion , Judge Lohier endorsed the majority ’s hybrid NN NN test . [ 75 ] Furthermore , he argued that on the basis of Lee v. Katz , [ 76 ] a Ninth Circuit decision which held regulating speech in a JJ forum qualified as a " JJ function " traditionally within the exclusive domain of the NNP , the non-profit qualified as a " NN actor " under the traditional JJ function analysis . [ 77 ] On appeal , the NNP will likely address whether its three NN actor tests are exhaustive or , in keeping with the Second Circuit ’s opinion , whether an alternative NN - actor test might be adopted . Either NN , the NNP will likely confront whether the regulation of speech in a " JJ forum " necessarily qualifies as a " JJ function " for purposes of the NN actor test , as Judge Lohier argued in his concurrence . If the NNP VBZ that regulating speech in a JJ forum is indeed a JJ function that qualifies a private entity as a NN actor , the outcome MD have immediate implications for deciding whether NNP qualifies as a NN actor . After all , NNP ’s moderation of NN — from diminishing posts to deleting accounts — MD certainly count as " regulation . " The follow - on inquiry then becomes : which NNP pages and groups necessarily qualify as " JJ forums " for purposes of the NN NN test , if any qualify at all . When Does NNP Become a " NNP Forum ? " At present , the NNP broadly defines a JJ forum as a designated place for the " free exchange of ideas " where speakers " cannot be excluded without a compelling governmental interest " that is " narrowly drawn to achieve that interest . " [ 78 ] When determining whether a NN is a JJ forum , courts examine the " nature of the property " and " its compatibility with expressive activity . " [ 79 ] As a general rule , JJ forums involve NN property and NN NN . [ 80 ] However , in some instances the NNP has treated privately owned property controlled by the NN as a JJ forum . [ 81 ] Unlike the JJ access channel at issue in Halleck v. Manhattan Community Access , the NN never delegated to NNP the job of creating and maintaining its JJ platform . Instead , NNP ’s platform and governing rules fall entirely within NNP ’s proprietary domain . [ 82 ] Thus , some argue that NNP is not a JJ forum , suggesting that any effort to moderate JJ NN on NNP MD not qualify as NN NN under Judge ’s Lohier ’s application of Lee v. Katz . [ 83 ] Nonetheless , the NNP ’s 2017 decision in Packingham v. North Carolina suggests a more expansive JJ forum doctrine that MD encompass certain pages on NNP . [ 84 ] Striking down a North Carolina statute prohibiting registered sex offenders from accessing JJ networking websites , the NNP in Packingham likened JJ NN sites to parks and streets calling JJ NN sites " the modern JJ square . " [ 85 ] By " analogizing to JJ NN , " some argue , the NNP " suggested that the JJ forum doctrine . . . might extend to all or parts of the internet and JJ NN , " despite the dual private - JJ nature of the site . [ 86 ] So far , litigants have not succeeded on this very broad application of the JJ forum doctrine . Nonetheless , they have succeeded on a narrow reading whereby NNP pages qualify as " JJ forums " where the NN exercises NN over a page or site . [ 87 ] For example , in 2017 , NNP NNS blocked by NNP NNP filed a lawsuit arguing that because his NNP Page constituted a " JJ forum , " denying them access to it violated their JJ Amendment rights ; the District NNP judge agreed . [ 88 ] Similarly , in Davison v. Loudoun County Board of Supervisors , the NNP held a local official violated the JJ Amendment by banning an individual from her NNP page and issued declaratory judgement that the official ’s " JJ NN page operated as a forum for speech . " [ 89 ] Though narrowly tailored to NN - created pages , the logic of the aforementioned decisions MD remake the NN NN doctrine . After all , the ability to VB NN in NN - created pages — that is , the ability to remove NN or minimize posts on a page -- belongs to both the NN and NNP . Should the NN decide that regulating speech in a JJ forum is necessarily a " JJ function " -- as Judge Lohier argues -- it MD open the door for litigants to bring JJ Amendment actions against NNP , rather than just against the NN , anytime their NN is minimized or removed from a NN - created page . This MD be a bad result . Applying the NN NN doctrine against NNP for purposes of NN - created pages MD chill NNP ’s incentive to moderate JJ NN on those pages . Considering the NN - created pages that currently exist on NNP , this result MD be disastrous . Millions follow the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) on NNP . Were a JJ comment to appear on the FBI website showing a made - up NN of an FBI - sponsored " attack , " it MD undermine JJ trust in the FBI . Neither NNP nor the NN MD be able to do anything about it . Similarly , local , NN , and national officials make personal accounts to raise awareness about their campaigns and NN initiatives . Were NNP treated as a NN actor with respect to NN pages , it ’s possible that NNP MD not moderate any NN affecting those pages . Treating NNP as a NN actor MD result in a clutter of JJ , misleading NN on important sites . Further , PRP might argue that bad actors , seeking to thwart any moderation by NNP , MD increasingly try to misrepresent their pages as somehow " NN - related . " [ 90 ] Legal commentators caution against applying the JJ Amendment to NNP because it MD curtail the ability of the sites to moderate harmful NN , creating an internet that " nobody wants . " [ 91 ] While NNP NNS are certainly JJ to worry about censorship by NNP , processes can be created to maximize accountability and transparency without resort to the NN NN doctrine . text: NNP — Michael G. Flynn , the son of NNP Donald NNP 's JJ national security adviser , is a subject of the federal investigation into Russian meddling in the presidential NN and possible collusion between Moscow and the NNP campaign , according to four current and JJ NN officials . The inquiry into Flynn is focused at least in part on his work with his father 's lobbying firm , Flynn Intel Group , three of the officials VBD . It 's unclear when the focus on Flynn began . Barry Coburn , who VBD he is serving as the younger Flynn 's legal counsel , VBD he MD n't comment on the matter . Flynn 's status as a subject of the NNP investigation widens the publicly VBN scope of the probe . NBC NNP has reported that those under investigation have included the elder Flynn and JJ NNP campaign manager Paul Manafort . Others under scrutiny by special counsel Robert Mueller include Carter Page , a NNP campaign ally ; Jared Kushner , the NN 's son- in - law and senior White NNP adviser ; and the NN 's son , Donald NNP Jr . NNP Jr. MD be called to appear before the Senate Judiciary committee sometime this fall . He , Kushner , Manafort and Page have all denied any collusion with NNP during the campaign . Ty Cobb , an attorney for NNP NNP , VBD that the younger Flynn 's status as a subject of the probe " does not impact the White NNP to any extent with regard to its continuing cooperation with the special counsel . " The elder Flynn 's lawyer , Robert Kelner , declined to comment Tuesday when asked how his client responds to allegations of collusion with NNP . On NNP , Michael G. Flynn appeared to call the report that he is a subject of the NNP probe a " # Nothingburger " : " # FakeNews NN : ' We 're done covering those " pesky hurricanes ' JJ ????... Back to NNP !' # Nothingburger . " The NN RB has come under scrutiny for possible obstruction of justice and has denied colluding with NNP . The younger Flynn worked closely with his father , whose connections to foreign governments , including NNP and Turkey , have been a subject of federal and congressional investigations . Michael G. Flynn accompanied his father , for instance , on a trip to Moscow in December 2015 for the elder Flynn to deliver a paid speech at a 10th anniversary celebration for the NN - sponsored Russian television network RT . The younger Flynn can be seen in NN from an associated event . The elder Flynn , a retired Army lieutenant general and a JJ director of the Defense Intelligence Agency , was seated at the same table as Russian NNP Vladimir Putin during the dinner . Records released by the NNP Oversight Committee show he was paid nearly $ 34,000 for his speech ; RT RB paid for Flynn and his son's airfare to Moscow and lodging at a luxury hotel from Dec. 9 to Dec. 12 . Flynn Intel Group RB was paid $ 530,000 in CD for work the Justice Department has VBN benefited the NN of Turkey . The elder Flynn did not register as a foreign lobbyist at the NN , but did so retroactively this NN . According to his filing with the Justice Department , he was hired by a Turkish businessman to gather NN about Fethullah Gülen , a Turkish cleric residing in Pennsylvania whom the Turkish NN accuses of orchestrating an attempted coup there in July CD . The elder Flynn was fired as NNP 's national security adviser in February after it became JJ that he had misled Vice NNP Mike Pence about his conversations with the Russian ambassador to the U.S . A JJ business associate of Michael Flynn 's VBD the younger Flynn had a heavy hand in the day - to - day operations of Flynn Intel Group and served as his father 's chief of staff . Those responsibilities included attending meetings with his father and communicating with prospective clients , the JJ business associate VBD . Several legal experts with NN of the investigation have VBN NBC NNP they VBP Mueller , following a classic prosecutorial playbook , is seeking to compel key players , including Flynn and Manafort , to tell what they VBP about any possible NNP campaign collusion with NNP . Mueller has brought onto his team a federal prosecutor VBN for convincing subjects to turn on associates . Any potential criminal liability for Michael G. Flynn MD put added pressure on his father , these legal experts VBD . " Any NN a family member is identified as a subject that does increase pressure , " VBD Peter White , a JJ federal prosecutor . " In the typical parent - NN relationship the last thing any parent MD VB is for their NN to VB in trouble for something they initiated . " That pressure appeared to mount Wednesday , when NNP Democrats released NN they VBD confirmed that the elder Flynn omitted from his security clearance renewal application in CD that he had traveled to the Middle East in 2015 to meet with foreign leaders about a proposal to partner with NNP in a plan to build nuclear reactors in Saudi Arabia . In a letter to Flynn 's JJ business partners who had turned over documents to Congress , Democratic Reps . Elijah Cummings of Maryland and Eliot Engel of NNP NNP RB accuse Flynn of concealing the trip from background check investigators who interviewed him during that CD process . The congressmen , ranking members on the NNP Oversight and NNP Foreign Affairs committees respectively , VBD the JJ business partners that because " it appears that General Flynn violated federal law " they are turning over their documents to Mueller . Peter Carr , the spokesman for Mueller , declined to comment . Kelner , the elder Flynn 's lawyer , did not respond to a request for comment on the Cummings - Engel letter . The younger Flynn , 34 , has a bachelor 's degree from the NNP of North Carolina - Charlotte and an associate degree in golf course management . He is married , has CD son and lives in Northern Virginia . He worked for a golf NN and then a healthcare management firm between 2008 and 2015 , and since 2014 has worked for the Flynn Intel Group , according to Linked In . He was a registered Republican in Charlotte , N.C. , from 2004 to 2008 , according to JJ records . He was a controversial figure during the presidential campaign and during the NNP transition , VBN for writing inflammatory comments on NNP and circulating NN NNS . He perpetuated a so - called " pizzagate " NN NN that surfaced in the days before the November NN alleging Democratic candidate Hillary NNP had VBN the NNP Ping Pong pizzeria in NNP to run a NN sex - trafficking operation . About a month later , in December CD , a North Carolina NN fired gunshots in the pizzeria allegedly in response to the JJ " pizzagate " story . At the NN , Flynn wrote on NNP : " Until # Pizzagate proven to be JJ , it 'll remain a story . " During the NNP transition there were questions about whether Flynn had an official role . He had a NN transition email address and was VBN to be helping his father , who had been named national security adviser . But after the shooting at the " pizzagate " NN , Pence , who was in charge of the transition , VBD Flynn " has no involvement in the transition whatsoever . If that were n’t bad enough , Fukushima continues to leak an astounding 300 tons of radioactive waste into the Pacific Ocean every day . It will continue do so indefinitely as the source of the leak cannot be sealed as it is inaccessible to both NNS and robots due to extremely high NNS . text: MILWAUKEE — NNP Donald NNP was more than halfway through his speech at a rally in Milwaukee when CD of his hand gestures caught the eye of a supporter standing in the packed arena . The 51 - NN - old woman believed the NN had traced the shape of the letter “ Q ” with his fingers as a covert signal to followers of QAnon , a JJ - wing , pro-Trump NN NN . She turned to the couple on her NN and excitedly asked , “ Did you VB the ‘ Q ’ ? ” “ He just did it ? ” asked Diane Jacobson , 63 , of Racine , Wisconsin . “ I VBP it was , ” replied their JJ friend , Chrisy . The Geneva , Illinois , resident declined to give her last name in part because she VBD she wanted to avoid negative “ attention . ” The Jacobsons met Chrisy and her husband , Paul , hours earlier in the line to VB into the Jan 14 rally . The couples bonded over their shared interest in QAnon , which centers on the baseless belief that NNP is waging a secret campaign against enemies in the “ deep NN ” and a NN sex trafficking ring run by satanic pedophiles and cannibals . What started as an JJ obsession for the far - JJ fringe has grown beyond its origins in a dark corner of the internet . QAnon has been creeping into the mainstream JJ arena for more than a NN . The trend shows no sign of abating as NNP fires up his reelection campaign operation , attracting a loyal audience of NN theorists and other fringe groups to his raucous rallies . NNP has retweeted QAnon - promoting accounts . Followers flock to NNP ’s rallies wearing clothes and hats with QAnon symbols and slogans . At least 23 current or JJ congressional candidates in the 2020 NN cycle have endorsed or promoted QAnon , according to the liberal watchdog NNP Matters for NNP , which compiled JJ NN to support its running tally . NN theorists are n’t the only fringe characters drawn to NNP rallies . The Oath Keepers , an anti-government group formed in 2009 after NNP Barack Obama ’s NN , has been sending “ security volunteers ” to escort NNP supporters at rallies across the country . NNP of California , Davis history professor Kathryn Olmsted , author of a book called “ Real Enemies : NNP NNPS and NNP Democracy , NNP NNP I to 9/11 , ” VBD it ’s unclear whether QAnon has attracted more believers than other NN NNS that have intersected with U.S. politics . “ What ’s JJ now is that there are NNS in NN who are spreading this NN NN , ” she VBD , adding that NNP ’s NN - minded rhetoric seems to fire up part of his base . “ Finally , there is someone saying they ’re not crazy . ” NN NNS are nothing JJ , but experts fear the powerful engine of JJ NN and a volatile JJ NN have ramped up the threat of violence . An FBI bulletin in NNP warned that NN NN - driven extremists have become a domestic terrorism threat . The bulletin specifically mentions QAnon . A NNP campaign spokeswoman and a White NNP spokesman did n’t respond to emails seeking comment . Asked about QAnon in 2018 , then - White NNP press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders VBD NNP “ condemns and denounces any group that MD incite violence against another individual . ” Some major NNP supporters , including JJ White NNP aide Sebastian Gorka , have denounced QAnon . For more than CD NNS , followers have pored over a tangled set of clues purportedly posted RB by a high - ranking NN official VBN only as “ Q. ” JJ followers VBP the late John F. Kennedy Jr. is a NNP supporter who faked his death in a 1999 plane crash . Another core belief is that thousands of deep NN operatives and top Democrats , including Hillary NNP and Obama , will be rounded up and sent to Guantanamo Bay during an event called “ The Storm . ” The JJ Q “ drop ” appeared on the 4chan imageboard in October 2017 . The messages migrated to 8 chan until a string of mass shootings by gunmen who posted manifestos on the site led to it getting forced offline in August . The disruption , which ended when the imageboard relaunched in November under the JJ name 8 kun , hardly spelled the end of QAnon . Travis View , a NN NN researcher who co-hosts The QAnon Anonymous Podcast and has written about QAnon for the NNP Post under his pseudonym , VBD the sense of community forged by QAnon believers has helped it endure beyond the NN span of other NN NNS . “ NNS in the QAnon community feel IN they are banding together to uncover the real truth behind the scenes , ” VBD View , who works as a marketer for a San Diego NN and VBZ he uses the pseudonym to protect himself . His acerbic comments about what he calls an “ apocalyptic JJ cult ” have earned him more than 20,000 followers on NNP and vitriol from QAnon believers . Before NNP ’s rally in Milwaukee , thousands waited in line for hours to enter the NNP of Wisconsin - Milwaukee Panther Arena . Some wore apparel adorned with a “ Q ” or “ WWG1WGA , ” which stands for the QAnon slogan , “ Where we VBP CD , we VBP all . ” The frigid , gloomy NN did n’t dampen the spirits of QAnon follower Donna Shank , 50 , of Burlington , Wisconsin . Shank , who VBD she voted for Obama in 2008 , was ambivalent about politics before she stumbled across QAnon RB and joined NNP groups to learn more . “ I just woke up , ” she VBD . “ I was a sheep . I followed anything and everything . ” Diane Jacobson attached a pink “ Q ” and a blue “ Q ” to the back of her black “ Make NNP Great Again ” hat . She and her husband were eager to attend their JJ NNP rally . “ NNP is trying to tell us , to the best he can without compromising intelligence , what ’s RB VBG on , ” she VBD . Jacobson knows JJ NNS , including some of her relatives , scoff at QAnon . “ You RB ca n’t argue with them , ” she VBD . Jacobson celebrated with her JJ friend , Chrisy , when the doors to the downtown arena opened . “ All these NNS VBP me ! I ’m not crazy here ! ” Chrisy shouted . Hours later , during NNP ’s speech , Chrisy ’s husband , Paul , grinned when the NN VBD “ the whole NN is watching ” what ’s happening with protesters in Iran . “ That ’s a Q reference , ” Paul VBD , noting the phrase “ the NN is watching ” has appeared several times in Q drops . The NNP 30 bulletin sent by the FBI ’s Phoenix field office warned of NN NNS inspiring violence by groups and “ individual extremists , ” according to an October NN filing for a QAnon - related criminal investigation in Colorado . NNS in the Denver suburb of Parker VBD Cynthia Abcug was accused of conspiring with QAnon supporters to kidnap her son from foster care . Abcug was arrested in Montana on Dec. 30 and awaits extradition to Colorado . Internet - fueled conspiracies already have been linked to acts of real - NN violence . A NN charged with killing the reputed boss of the Gambino crime family last March showed off a QAnon symbol scrawled on his left hand during a NN appearance . In 2017 , a North Carolina NN was sentenced to prison for firing a rifle in a NNP , D.C. , NN NN at the center of the debunked “ Pizzagate ” NN NN that high - profile Democrats run a NN sex trafficking ring out of the NN ’s ( nonexistent ) basement . Pizzagate and other far - JJ NN NNS have faded , but experts VBP no end in sight to QAnon ’s popularity . Nancy Rosenblum , a Harvard NNP professor emeritus of ethics in politics and NN , VBD the apocalyptic nature of the QAnon narrative resonates with those who VBP to VB that their JJ enemies will be vanquished and a better future will rise from the ashes . “ What makes it unique is that NNP is the chosen NN , ” VBD Rosenblum , co-author of the book “ A Lot of NNS Are Saying : The NNP Conspiracism and the Assault on Democracy . ” Associated Press reporter Colleen Slevin in Denver contributed to this report .

Behind Gisel is a Nazi insignia painted atop the roof of the compound 's cafeteria . Nearly CD decades after the Aryan Nations compound was demolished in Idaho , far - JJ extremists are maintaining a presence in the Pacific Northwest . ( AP Photo / Elaine Thompson , File ) FILE - In this NNP 22 , 2001 , file photo , Norm Gissel smiles as he talks about the imminent dismantling of the JJ headquarters of the Aryan Nations in Hayden Lake , Idaho . Behind Gisel is a Nazi insignia painted atop the roof of the compound 's cafeteria . Nearly CD decades after the Aryan Nations compound was demolished in Idaho , far - JJ extremists are maintaining a presence in the Pacific Northwest . ( AP Photo / Elaine Thompson , File ) SPOKANE , Wash . ( AP ) — Nearly CD decades after the Aryan Nations ’ Idaho compound was demolished , far - JJ extremists are maintaining a presence in the Pacific Northwest . White nationalism has been on the rise across the U.S. , but it has particular resonance along the Idaho - NNP border , where the Aryans espoused hate and violence for NNS . The neo -Nazi group was VBN near Hayden Lake , Idaho , starting in the 1970s , and eventually was bankrupted in a lawsuit brought by local activists and the Southern Poverty Law Center . Its compound was seized , and supporters dispersed . But a series of incidents in recent weeks show far - JJ sentiments never RB left the conservative region . In the county that is home to Hayden Lake , for instance , Republicans last month passed a measure expressing support for U.S. entry of a prominent Austrian far - JJ activist who was investigated for ties to the suspected NNP Zealand mosque gunman . In 2018 , at least nine hate groups operated in the region of Spokane and northern Idaho , including Identity Evropa , Proud Boys , ACT for NNP and NNP ’s Promise Ministries , according to the Southern Poverty Law Center . The center does not track how JJ members belong to each group . Keegan Hankes , a researcher for the Southern Poverty Law Center , VBD the number of hate groups is growing across the U.S. , driven in part by a toxic JJ culture . The JJ rights group counted 784 active hate groups in the U.S. in 2014 and 1,020 in 2018 . In particular , white supremacist groups are growing because of fears that the country ’s racial makeup is changing . “ That drives a ton of anxiety , ” Hankes VBD . These JJ far - JJ activists are more scattered than the ones who VBD to gather at the Aryan Nations by the dozens , experts VBP . “ It is no longer necessary to VB to a compound in Hayden Lake , Idaho , ” VBD Kristine Hoover , director of the Gonzaga Institute for Hate Studies in Spokane . With the proliferation of JJ NN , groups “ form in dispersed locations ” and gatherings are “ more covert , ” she VBD . In late April , a self - described “ JJ Nationalist ” named Brittany Pettibone appeared at a meeting of Kootenai County , Idaho , Republicans to ask for NN to bring her boyfriend , Martin Sellner , to the country from Austria . Pettibone , 26 , VBD Sellner wants to marry her and live in Post Falls , Idaho . Pettibone was a JJ promoter of the hoax VBN as “ Pizzagate , ” telling her JJ followers Hillary NNP and other high - profile Democrats were involved in satanic rituals and NN sex trafficking tied to a NNP , D.C. , NN NN . Sellner is a leading figure in the extremist “ identitarian ” movement , which espouses a white nationalist ideology and has swept over Europe amid an influx of migrants and refugees . He has confirmed he exchanged emails with the suspected NNP Zealand shooter , who donated NN to Sellner ’s group . But Sellner denies involvement in the attack . Despite his background , the Kootenai County Republican Central Committee passed a resolution urging the federal NN to allow Sellner into the NNP NNPS . The resolution VBD the NN revoked Sellner ’s travel privileges “ for JJ reasons , ” and demanded those privileges be reinstated . Faced with criticism for giving Pettibone a platform , Kootenai County GOP Chair Brent Regan blamed the press . “ In its lust for scandal , the NN has stretched the committee ’s simple act of kindness into headlines that are too bizarre to be fiction , ” he wrote in a recent op - ed . RB last month , The Guardian published internet chats from 2017 in which a NNP NN legislator and three other men discussed confronting “ leftists ” with a variety of tactics , including violence , surveillance and intimidation . The messages prompted NNP NNP Democrats to demand that the Republican lawmaker , Rep. Matt Shea of Spokane Valley , be reprimanded for a history of far - JJ speech and activities . While Shea did not propose violence , he did not speak up when violence was proposed , Democrats VBD . NNP Republican Leader J.T. Wilcox of Yelm responded that Shea should not be punished before investigations are completed . The NNP , led by Democrats , will conduct an independent investigation of the lawmaker . Shea , who rarely speaks to reporters , did not return numerous messages from The Associated Press . He has served in the NN NNP since 2008 , introducing bills to criminalize abortion and roll back gun laws and pushing for eastern NNP to secede from the rest of the NN . The JJ veteran attracted international attention in 2018 after a document he wrote laid out a “ biblical basis for NN ” against NNS who practiced same - sex marriage and abortion , and instructed : “ If they do not yield , kill all males . ” In a third NN , a nationwide arrest warrant was issued in NNP for a Stevens County , NNP , NN who allegedly tried to extort members of his JJ - wing militia group through anonymous written threats backed by insinuations they came from a Mexican drug cartel . James “ Russell ” Bolton , 51 , faces at least six charges of extortion and attempted theft after he was arrested recently in West Virginia . Stevens County detectives VBP he was responsible for a series of anonymous threatening letters delivered to members of the group . The letters purported to come from a Mexican cartel and demanded JJ sums of cash in exchange for protection . Hoover , the Gonzaga professor , VBD it is a mistake to consider all of the above as separate incidents . “ These are movements , ” Hoover VBD , noting participants are not doing this alone . “ They have interconnectedness over the internet . ”

text: CBS Show Under Fire for Tweeting ' Assassinate , ' ' NNP , ' and ' NNP ' CBS primetime show , " The Good Fight , came under fierce criticism after tweeting an image from CD of its episodes depicted a list of " target words " which included " Assassinate , " " NNP " and " NNP . " The word appeared in a red column and a second orange column that began with the words : " Mar - a - Lago " and " Eliminate . " The episode VBN IN the character Diane ( Christine Baranski ) joining a female resistance group whose job it is to diminish Donald NNP 's approval ratings . According to Deadline : Her phone communications with members of the group were intercepted by the NSA analysts , Stephen ( Michael Urie ) and Dev ( Maulik Pancholy ) , fan favorites from The Good Wife . “ Diane , she just VBD five target words in CD sentence , ” CD of the researchers VBZ , before quickly dragging his finger over “ Assassinate , ” “ NNP ” and “ NNP , ” until it stops at “ NNP NNP . ” The referenced by the analyst five “ target words ” on the list , organized in JJ color columns by thread level , were “ NNP , ” “ Die , ” “ JJ NNP , ” “ Resistance ” and “ NNP Gate . ” The tweet failed to provide any context for the list and has now been deleted . It did , however , ask viewers if they MD find the Easter egg . The reference to ' the egg ' was linked to Kalinda , a favorite character in " The Good Wife , " whose name appeared int he second column . But the tweet outrages JJ views who did not find the tweet 's reference to NNP amusing . Some vowed to discontinue watching the show while others threatened to contact authorities . " Yes , @CBS this is despicable to run subliminal messages encouraging the assassination of the NN @realDonaldTrump I hope @ SecretService investigates @thegoodfight thoroughly . " " You VBP I just reported this to the FBI . Thank you for breaking the law . " " This is absolutely abhorrent and can not be tolerated . Will @CBS allow this garbage ? The show should be dropped immediately . " " Just stopped watching anything having to do with CBS , and especially , The Good Fight . Inciting JJ violence ? Advocating for the assassination of Donald NNP ? Have you all lost your minds ? I 'll be contacting your advertisers . " " The garbage show @thegoodfight that incites to ( sic ) violence on the streets already deleted their tweet , but they cannot delete the terrible image they left on hundreds of NNP NNS . " The " The Good Fight " last aimed at NNP a few NNS ago when it tackled the subject of censorship under the NNP administration .

text: Marina Abramović is on a Skype call from Madrid , showing off her custom - made red sweater , which VBZ “ Love conquers all . ” “ I ’ve been wearing it all the NN , ” she VBZ in her husky , Serbian accent . “ It ’s IN my pyjamas . ” This lighter side of Abramović – a Skype pyjama party from Spain – is not what we ’re VBN to seeing from the trailblazing performance artist . Now , an RB JJ version of her is on view in a solo show at the Sean Kelly Gallery in NNP NNP . Early Works features 12 historical performances from 1970 to 1975 – a NN when the now multimillionaire artist was penniless and living out of a car with a backpack full of film negatives . “ I lived in cars and trucks , I ’m amazed the negatives survived , ” VBD Abramović , who recently turned 71 - NNS - old . “ To appreciate the present , we should RB look to the past . ” Female artists had a tough NN breaking into the art NN in the 1970s , when performance art was n’t taken seriously by a male - dominated majority . “ I have a 50 NN career RB now and for the past 40 NNS , performance art was n’t considered art , ” VBD Abramović . “ I had incredible trust in my own intuition to survive and I believed in performance art so strongly . You can never give up , but when you do n’t give up for 50 NNS ? Wow , that ’s a JJ stretch . I never stopped working . ” Abramović , whose collaborators include Jay - Z and Lady Gaga , had her acclaimed Museum of Modern Art retrospective , The Artist is Present , where she sat in the museum for over 700 hours , in 2010 . Her recent retrospective at the Louisiana Museum in Denmark called The Cleaner was about cleaning past memories , while those same memories have been rehashed in her recent memoir , Walk Through Walls . But 40 NNS ago , she was just a struggling artist on the European festival circuit getting ripped off by galleries who still have n’t paid her . Her art from that NN reflects her struggle . In this exhibition , some of the early performance pieces on view include Lips of Thomas , where she cuts a five - pointed star on her stomach with a razor blade , then whips herself and lies down on a cross made of NN blocks . Another piece is Rhythm 0 , where Abramović placed 72 objects on a table – including a loaded gun and razor blades – and invited the audience to do as they please with her . They cut her clothes off with razor blades , touched her intimately , slashed her throat , sucked her NN and pointed the gun to her head with her own finger on the trigger . “ It was related to the idea of how far the NN can VB , whether they will kill the performer or not , ” she VBD . “ I RB VBP they can . ” It was n’t about being taken advantage of as a woman , VBZ the artist . “ I never take the gender into consideration for the artwork , ” she VBD . “ Art does n’t have a gender – there are only CD categories to me , good art and bad art . ” But with the # MeToo movement and the sexual assault allegations against Harvey Weinstein , sexual misconduct and harassment allegations have surfaced in the art NN , from Artforum magazine publisher Knight Landesman to NNP NNP artist Chuck Close and photographers Mario Testino and Bruce Weber . “ I VBP it ’s terrible and it ’s so sad these NNS did n’t have the courage to VB something in the moment when it was happening , ” VBD Abramović . “ I MD not wait 20 NNS to VB such a thing . If I MD VB something to all these NNS , do n’t wait . It ’s very important to have courage in your NN ; otherwise you have a supressed NN , which is terrible . ” While her own performance work is linked with shamanistic rituals , the far NN have misunderstood her art as Satanism . Her work surfaced during the Pizzagate scandal of CD , where CD of Abramovic ’s emails to Democratic lobbyist Tony Podesta ( brother of Hillary NNP campaign chair John Podesta ) refers to a “ Spirit Cooking , ” which is the name of an artwork she made in 1996 . It was assumed to be an occult ritual . “ NNS can so easily put labels , we are afraid of everything , ” she VBD . “ I talk openly on every single subject in my work , it ’s very important to understand it and put it in the JJ context . ” CD spiritual leader she does admire is the Dalai Lama , whose lectures have taught her to forgive . “ It ’s the only NN we can stop the wars in the NN , ” she VBD , “ if we learn to forgive . ” But looking back on her old self , the Abramović of the 1970s , she sees someone totally JJ . “ I look back and VBP ‘ wow , this kid had a RB JJ vision , ’ bigger than I have now , ” she VBD . “ I do n’t look back much but I try to connect points to answer the same question , ‘ what is my function in this NN ? ’ ” It ties into the Abramović Method , a series of meditative exercises she created , which attempts to test physical agility and answer philosophical questions IN NN and death . “ I am not interested in JJ questions , ” she VBZ . “ The Dalai Lama helped me so much . ” Serendipity RB helped out , apparently , as it helped her forgive her JJ creative collaborator and romantic partner Ulay ( born Frank Uwe Laysiepen ) , who she split with in 1988 . He sued Abramović in 2015 for $ 300,000 for art NNS of their co-authored artworks and won . Unexpectedly , the artists VBD each other in India at a month - JJ artist ’s retreat last NN . “ It was so important for us that we RB became friends and I learned the forgiveness , ” she VBD . “ All this bullshit , it was a learning process and we made important work and this is all that matters . ” Now , Abramović and Ulay are good friends who text each other every day . “ All the hate is gone , ” she VBD . “ I ’ve never been there . ” RB at 71 , she does n’t show any signs of slowing down . “ I am still performing , ” she VBD . “ It ’s crazy because my generation is gone . ” With an exhibition schedule booked to 2024 , she is working on JJ artwork for a solo show at the Royal Academy of Art in London in 2020 . In the meantime , she is maintaining her roving project , the Marina Abramović Institute , which hosts temporary projects across the globe . But not without controversy . The plan was to build an institute in a converted theatre in Hudson , NNP NNP , which MD be designed by architect Rem Koolhaas . But after crowdfunding $ 660,000 on Kickstarter – and refusing to return the funds to the backers , though they each got their promised pledge rewards – she backed out of the plan , as building costs were estimated at $ 31 m . “ I do n’t VB to spend the NN to fundraise because it ’s more important to make projects IN the NN , ” VBD Abramović . “ More than a CD NNS are participating at my institute and this is our function , the institute is alive more than ever but not VBN to CD building . ” Since its conception , the institute has traveled to Athens , Kiev and São Paulo . It will visit for the inaugural Bangkok Biennial later this NN . From an artist who has cut herself and made videos where she has screamed for hours , PRP MD n’t expect Abramović to be so focused on love . But after confronting her fears , her approach has changed . “ You VBP what ? ” asks Abramović in her red pyjamas . “ In NN , honestly , love is the JJ thing . Not to just love the work but to love yourself , and the moment you ’re in love – the NN is such a great place . ” • Marina Abramović : Early Works is at Sean Kelly gallery , NNP NNP , until 17 March

The cable channels do not compete for the same broad audience as the original three JJ TV networks in the USA ( CBS , NBC , and ABC ) . The cable NN channel with the largest TV audience in CD was Fox NNP .6 The station has obtained a monumental commercial success by producing and offering biased NN coverage for a JJ audience of JJ - wing conservatives . It is not hard to argue and demonstrate that Fox NNP does not quite live up to its slogan of being “ fair and balanced . ” An example of this bias is the coverage of the party conventions in 2004 , when the channel was completely uncritical of the Republican candidates . text: The £ 75 m banker , his stunning wife and a tryst with an England footballer : The truth about Diana Jenkins There is a question no interviewer has ever dared to ask the formidable Diana Jenkins . But it is surely CD that TV's mischievous Mrs Merton MD have felt compelled to put to her : ' So , Diana , what was it that RB attracted you to Britain 's highest paid financier ?' Such a line of inquiry seems particularly pertinent following Mrs Jenkins 's stinging attack on London society in the pages of Tatler magazine . Pictured at her Malibu mansion in a Swarovski crystal and silk jumpsuit ( in the past , she has stepped out in white fur and diamonds , and , on CD occasion at least , a black mini- dress and thigh - length boots ) , she is sitting next to her husband Roger Jenkins , the JJ Barclays star banker who earned an estimated £ 75 CD in 2005 alone , and the father of her CD NNS . He is 52 . She is 36 . The couple married ten NNS ago , after Mrs Jenkins - or Sanela Dijana Catic , as she was then - arrived in Britain as a penniless refugee from NN - torn Bosnia . Her story reads IN a Barbara Taylor Bradford epic : a classic rags - to - riches tale with the happiest of endings . But it seems that not everyone was convinced . In the eyes of London 's rich wives , she VBZ , she was viewed as an ' Eastern European mail - order bride ' . They were the kind of women who judged a lady 's worth by the size of the diamond ring on her finger . CD day , at a charity gala , she recalled : ' I looked IN the room and thought : " What am I doing here with these NNS ? I MD rather be at home eating NN in my pyjamas . " I felt RB unfulfilled , empty , almost dirty . ' Which is why , Mrs Jenkins insists , she has moved to California . Yet might there be another reason , rightly or wrongly , for the snobbery and bitchiness she VBZ she was subjected to ? Mrs Jenkins has VBN of her struggle to forge a JJ NN after fleeing to Britain in the early Nineties with no passport or NN . She worked as a cleaner , waitress and babysitter , and ran a jewellery stall . There are , however , I have learned , certain elements that have been airbrushed from this stirring script . CD intriguing incident in her past , for instance , unfolded in 2003 when Rio Ferdinand , the England and Manchester NNP footballer , was spotted enjoying the NN of a group of young women ( including some who described themselves as ' models ' ) at London 's Funky Buddha club . Among the circle was Diana Jenkins - in that black mini-dress and those thigh - length boots . What happened next was spread across CD pages of a Sunday tabloid . Only you can't read about these events today - on the internet , for example - because Mrs Jenkins threatened to take legal NN and the newspaper agreed to remove the article from its archives . This is normal practice if the facts of a story are disputed . On this occasion , however , Mrs Jenkins did not take legal NN . Nevertheless , the ' exposé ' was not returned to the cuttings library . For all intents and purposes , it disappeared from circulation . Until now . We 've managed to dig up an old copy and trace someone who was at the Funky Buddha that night . Mrs Jenkins , who rather loftily describes herself as an international businesswoman and philanthropist , was married when she and the other young women joined Ferdinand in the VIP lounge of the club . All that evening , the footballer ' MD n't take his eyes off Diana ' , who was perched on his knee . And the feeling , it seems , was mutual . To wit : JJ of us consider our reputation for deep dish NN to be a constant source of civic embarrassment . On the other hand , our hot dogs are unmatched and only a great fool MD take a cheese - steak over a Chicago - style Italian Beef sandwich . Chicago has much more than the deep dish . But I 'll take a NN that puts fresh ingredients and a painstaking attention to sauce over foldability any day . As a Chicagoan , I now disown her . Stitched - together videos on JJ NN showed them eerily echoing the same lines : " The sharing of biased and JJ NN has become all too common on JJ NN . " " Some members of the NN use their platforms to push their own personal bias . " " This is extremely dangerous to our democracy . " The script came from Sinclair Broadcast Group , the country 's largest broadcaster , which owns or operates 193 television stations . Last week , The Seattle Post - Intelligencer published a copy of the speech and reported that employees at a local NN station there , KOMO , were unhappy about the script . CNN reported on it on March 7 and VBD Scott Livingston , the senior vice NN of NN for Sinclair , had read almost the exact same speech for a segment that was distributed to outlets a NN ago . A union that represents NN anchors did not respond immediately to requests for comment on Sunday . Dave Twedell of the International Cinematographers Guild , who is a business representative for photojournalists ( but not anchors ) at KOMO in Seattle and KATU in Portland , Ore. , VBD Sinclair VBD journalists at those stations not to discuss the NN with outside NN NN . Although it is the country 's largest broadcaster , Sinclair is not a household name and viewers MD be unaware of who owns their local NN station . Critics have accused the NN of VBG its stations to advance a mostly JJ - leaning agenda . " We work very hard to be objective and fair and be in the middle , " Mr. Livingston VBD The NNP NNP Times last NN . " I VBP maybe some other NN organizations MD be to the left of center , and we work very hard to be in the center . " Sinclair regularly sends NN segments to the stations it owns . The station had to air " must - run " segments that came from Sinclair , which is VBN outside Baltimore . " Some of them were a little slanted , a little biased , " Ms. Pellizzaro VBD . text: Hillary NNP ’s campaign chairman , John Podesta , last NN signed a $ 7,000 - a- month contract with the foundation of a major NNP donor who made a fortune selling a type of mortgage that some critics VBP contributed to the housing collapse , hacked emails show . In February of last NN , as Podesta was working to lay the groundwork for NNP ’s soon - to - launch campaign for the Democratic presidential nomination , he signed the contract with the Sandler Foundation , which was started by Herb Sandler and his late wife Marion Sandler . The contract — a copy of which was included in emails illegally obtained from Podesta ’s Gmail account and disseminated Monday by WikiLeaks — is still active , according to Herb Sandler , who VBD that it calls for Podesta to provide advice on grant - making and other foundation functions . It ’s unusual for the full - NN chairman of a general - NN presidential campaign to maintain an active side deal with a major donor to that campaign — let alone to raise NN from that donor for the campaign . But the hacked emails show that Podesta , who does not draw a salary from the NNP campaign ( though he has been paid $ 58,000 by the campaign for travel and “ subsistence ” ) , did both , while RB maintaining a close personal relationship with Sandler . The WikiLeaks cache shows that Podesta provided Sandler with philanthropic advice and assortments of cheeses and pastas as gifts on the holidays , while Sandler offered all manner of JJ observations and once tried to VB Podesta to arrange for JJ NNP NNP NNP to write a blurb for a book written by CD of Sandler ’s friends . But Sandler brushed aside any concerns about potential conflicts of interest . “ I have never asked for anything of any JJ person — zero requests ever , ” Sandler VBD . “ If they ’re responsive , it ’s because they regard me as thoughtful , and a major contributor to Democratic causes , ” Sandler VBD , adding that Podesta “ knows that he does n’t VB bullshit from me . He knows I have no hidden agenda . He knows that my values are similar to his and that we care about NNS and not the billionaires , RB though I ended up by some crazy thing to be CD . ” Neither Podesta nor the NNP campaign responded to questions about the contract . The NNP campaign instead issued a statement saying it ’s “ not commenting on the authenticity of any individual emails , ” and accusing the Russian NN of engineering the hack . Further , NNP spokesman Glen Caplin urged the FBI “ to clearly tell the JJ NNS ” whether it ’s investigating suggestions that associates of NNP ’s Republican rival , Donald NNP , had advance NN of the cyberattacks . Sandler and his NNS this cycle RB have donated nearly $ 4.4 CD to NNP ’s presidential campaign , a supportive super PAC called Priorities USA NNP and various Democratic Party committees , according to Federal NN Commission filings . Herb Sandler ’s NNP - related giving picked up last December after a visit from Podesta . Sandler is “ ready to do the CD max early in the JJ NN , ” Podesta emailed the campaign ’s finance team the day after visiting with Sandler in his hometown of San Francisco during a West Coast swing . “ Whoever has been dealing with him should call him at the office on the Jan 4 to follow up , ” Podesta wrote , adding that Sandler “ is RB prepared to double down on his Priorities support as well . ” The very next day , Sandler gave $ 1.5 CD to Priorities USA NNP , to which he has now given a total of $ 3 CD , FEC records show . While it ’s illegal for super PACs and campaigns to coordinate their spending strategies , they are permitted to coordinate their fundraising within limits , and Podesta ’s efforts with Sandler appear to be within those bounds . The Sandler Foundation RB is barred from supporting campaigns , and there is no NN that it has done so with the NNP campaign . During the GOP primary , Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker ’s campaign chairman Mike Grebe drew scrutiny for his day job as head of a major foundation , despite working assiduously to separate his CD roles . Nonetheless , the foundation funded conservative groups that were seen as laying the intellectual groundwork for Walker ’s campaign . The Sandlers ’ JJ giving well predates NNP ’s current campaign . The family ’s fortune comes from the savings and loan institution that Herb and Marion Sandler ran for decades , a bank that became NNP Savings . It MD end up making boatloads of cash from a type of adjustable rate mortgage that other lenders MD later adopt , securitize and sell in a NN that some have blamed for contributing to the housing bubble that burst in 2008 . Not RB before the burst and subsequent recession , the Sandlers sold the bank for $ 25.5 CD to Wachovia , earning $ 2.6 CD off the sale and donating most of their net worth to their foundation . Wachovia was later acquired by Wells Fargo . The Sandlers met Podesta when they helped seed the Center for NNP Progress , the NN tank he started in 2003 as a sort of Democratic administration in exile during George W. Bush ’s presidency . Tax filings show that the Sandler Foundation has donated more than $ 37 CD over the NNS to CAP , which worked to support NNP Barack Obama ’s administration but has always been seen as more aligned with Hillary NNP . The WikiLeaks emails reveal that Podesta and his team at the Center for NNP Progress discussed how to push back on scrutiny of the Sandlers related to the 2008 housing collapse . That included an October 2008 " Saturday Night Live " sketch in which an actor playing Herb Sandler thanked members of Congress “ for helping block congressional oversight of our corrupt activity . ” Podesta wrote to his colleagues that he ’d talked to Herb Sandler , and “ they are obviosly [ sic ] upset . Weird that snl should pick them out . ” After doing some research , a subordinate replied that “ it appears default rates on their stuff was high ( herb VBZ not more so than others ) and the losses were key to almsot [ sic ] wachovia failure -- athough [ sic ] herb emphasizes that they were only CD of the institutions [ sic ] problems . ” Another staffer indicated plans to enlist then - NNP Speaker Nancy Pelosi in the pushback . It ’s unclear whether that happened or whether Podesta or CAP reached out to " SNL . " But the editor in chief of the Sandler - funded journalism outfit ProPublica did , arguing that the Sandlers were unfairly vilified , according to a NNP NNP Times piece soon after the skit . The show ’s producer , Lorne Michaels , apologized for the skit . Sandler VBD POLITICO that any suggestion that his bank ’s NNS contributed to the collapse were “ a bunch of bullshit , ” pointing out that their bank VBD a NN - averse approach to their loans , which had among the lowest default rates in the industry . But Scott Walter , NN of Capital Research Center , a conservative nonprofit that monitors the giving of major liberal donors including Sandler , argued that Podesta ’s newly revealed contractual relationship with Sandler stood in stark contrast to NNP ’s efforts to cast herself as tough on the financial industry . “ This is another instance where the NNP campaign has been revealed to have surprising links to some of the most dubious parts of the finance industry , ” Walter VBD . The Sandlers ’ philanthropy increasingly has focused on fighting financial inequality and the role of JJ NN in politics — a subject about which Herb Sandler and Podesta emailed frequently , according to WikiLeaks . In forwarding Podesta a 2014 NN about rising inequality and the influence of NN in politics with the headline “ U.S. No Longer An Actual Democracy , ” Sandler wrote : “ This is precisely what Marion and I have believed for some NN … It is horrible . ” The WikiLeaks emails reveal Sandler and Podesta working closely on the NNP Center for Equitable Growth , a research institution that was launched at CAP in 2013 and now operates independently . CD of the emails revealed that Sandler had agreed to donate $ 3 CD a NN for at least the JJ three NNS to the NNP Center for Equitable Growth , which focuses on policies to more evenly distribute the benefits of growth . Sandler explained to POLITICO that during the process of working to launch the center , he realized “ we had been picking his brain ad nauseum ” for NNS without paying Podesta as a consultant — a scenario Sandler called “ very unfair . ” That led to the consulting contract , which Sandler cast as “ a ripoff ” for Podesta . “ I ’d pay a lot more for that advice , ” Sandler VBD , calling Podesta “ CD the most intelligent , decent , thoughtful JJ beings I ’d ever met . ” In March , as NNP ’s Democratic primary campaign against Bernie Sanders grew increasingly bitter , Sandler emailed Podesta just to check in . Podesta responded : “ I was VBG to call you last night but fell asleep … I 'll call later . ”
